programme.title: Streetwise
programme.desc: We took the Ferrari 458 Italia for a spring ride around Lake Starnberg. Also: a test drive of BMW's 6 series convertible at the Table Mountain in South Africa. And: the Chevrolet Orlando family van.

programme.title: Streetwise
programme.desc: Audi built only 333 units of its GT model. We tested the everyday use compatibility of the R8 GT. In addition: the Mazda MX5, the most popular roadster in the world. And: the Mercedes-AMG GT3.

programme.title: Streetwise
programme.desc: More efficiency, less weight and more sportiness is what Audi promotes in order to win the race against BMW and Mercedes with their A6 2.0 TDI. Also: Patrick Dempsey and his racing team at the Grand Am Rolex Sportscar GT series.

programme.title: Streetwise
programme.desc: We put the Wiesmann MF5 at the racetrack in Spa-Francochamps in the Belgian Ardennes to the test. Also: Audi A1 vs. Mini Cooper RS. And: the GT Academy 2011 qualifying rounds.

programme.title: Streetwise
programme.desc: The Nurburgring 24 Hours is considered the most difficult long distance race in motor sports. Volkswagen set themselves this challenge with a car built especially for this occasion, their Golf 24.

programme.title: Streetwise
programme.desc: The Mercedes-Benz SL 65 AMG is the ultimate German muscle car in a tailor-made suit. Also: the Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG, the Formula 1 safety car. And: BMW's 6 series models.

programme.title: Jaguar D-Type
programme.desc: The high-achiever at the 24 hours of Le Mans. The Jaguar D-Type won the toughest endurance race in the world three times in a row.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The 1971 BMW 02 Touring was considered an ugly duckling at the time, but is now a coveted car. Also: the solid technology and moderate prices of the Mercedes-Benz 114/115 made them the first "people's Mercedes".

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: In the 1950s, companies like Tatra from Czechoslovakia introduced advanced, even pioneering automobiles. The clientele was exclusive, which is why now these streamlined cars are big rarities. We tracked down the owner of a 1937 Tatra T87.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The Porsche 911 Targa with its lightweight construction is an iconic car. Also: the Lotus Seven Twin Cam SS is more pf a race than a road car. And: the 1930 Bentley Blower and the dainty British roadster, the Sunbeam Tiger.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The 1967 Ford Fairlane GTA in NASCAR trim. Also: the 1995 Chrysler 300 C was the most powerful production vehicle in the US. And: the 1949 Cadillac Series 62 convertible set new standards in terms of luxury.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The 1947 Triumph 1800 Roadster provides space for 5 fresh air fans. Also: Le Jog, the toughest classic car rally in Europe. A German women's team takes on the challenge in their VW Iltis. And: a charming oldie, the 1919 Wolseley Stellite.

programme.title: Facel Vega Facellia
programme.desc: In the late 1950s, the Facel Vega Facellia was designed to compete with Porsche and Alfa Romeo and open a new market segment for the fledgling French luxury car company.

programme.title: BMW M3
programme.desc: In the late 80s BMW brought a car onto the market which carried true racing genes. Initially conceived as a homologation model for the German Touring Car Championship, it developed into being one of the world's hottest street sports car. Whenever its name is mentioned, car fans feel goosebumps - even today: the BMW M3.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: McLaren is one of the most famous automobile brands from Great Britain. There are hardly any sports cars that fascinate as much as a McLaren or have such a legendary heritage in motorsports. Two recent models from McLaren are the 650S and the limited series P1. Supercars is in the mood for love and dates the McLaren 650S at an old industrial area and on the race track.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: There are details which set super cars apart from normal cars and these details are essential. Super cars are the biggest, loudest and most expensive cars on the highway; they're four-wheeled works of arts.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: In celebration of its 100th anniversary, Maserati rewarded itself with a beautiful coupe called Maserati Alfiere. But that's not all. The company invites to a trip from Bologna to Turin featuring the most beautiful models from the last decades. Supercars takes part in this trip with a Granturismo MC Stradale.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: It’s name is Mulsanne, Bentely Mulsanne. The new flagship from Bentley reaches a top speed of close to 300 km/h, it is luxurious like a first class hotel and elegant like an Armani suit. Supercars reveals how it feels like to ride a dream car like this. Plus: Supercars takes a look at the remarkable Rolls Royce Ghost and the high-tech coupé Mercedes S 63 AMG.

programme.title: Volvo XC60
programme.desc: The Swedish landscape is characterized by mountains, forests and lonely roads. Ideal for this off-roader. The Volvo XC60 scores with many safety features and a cool appearance.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: At the old-timer grand prix at the Nürburgring you for example can see the Mercedes S with 160 horsepower that lead Rudolf Caracciola to victory in the 1927 opening race.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: In this episode we focused on Phoenix Racing, the successful team from the Eifel Region that rocked the DTM.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: At the Nürburgring Patrick chased a 12-cylinder Aston Martin Zagato down the track. Also on the show: a Hummer, a Renault Clio and a Frenchman in a Ferrari.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: Visitors from all over the world make their way to the Green Hell of the Nürburgring each year, including many Germans, Austrians and 5 crazy Englishmen in a taxi.

programme.title: Ken Block at the Monza Rallye Show
programme.desc: In Monza, Ken Block is set to compete against Allstars from motorsport at the Monza Rally Show.

programme.title: Put your car on TV
programme.desc: Hosts Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi invite petrol heads from the Middle East to bring their tuned cars to the 'The Walk' at Jumeirah Beach and have it rated in the categories speed, style and sound. Whoever receives the most points, wins a one night stay for two people at this glamorous Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. On this episode, a Chevrolet Camaro and Mercedes SLS AMG try to impress.

programme.title: Put your car on TV
programme.desc: If you want to see out-of-this-world, customized or tuned luxury vehicles or posh cars you need to go to 'The Walk', the glamorous boulevard of Jumeirah Beach. Put Your Car on TV invites car owners to have their vehicles judged by Saif Hattawi. The person with the most points wins a special treat from the Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. Among the presented cars are a BMW X5 and a Mercedes SLK 230.

programme.title: Put your car on TV
programme.desc: People from the Middle East are crazy about their cars. On Put Your Car on TV they have the chance to present their tuned vehicles and judged. They are awarded points based on speed, style and sound and the car owner with the most points, wins a special treat for two from the Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. Among the competitors are a Nova SS, a special Honda Acord and a car full of crystals.

programme.title: Bentley Bentayga
programme.desc: With the Bentley Bentayga, the traditional British brand is entering the fastest growing market segment. This world's first luxury SUV is a conglomerate of superlatives on wheels.

programme.title: Mercedes Sprinter, 2018
programme.desc: The Mercedes Sprinter belongs to the class of commercial vehicles. The light transporter is the dream for every tradesman. The third generation Sprinter is sleeker, more modern and more variable than ever.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Robust, honest, simple, the Land Rover is the bedrock of all off-road vehicles. Built in 1948 as a simple car for British farmers, the vehicle quickly became an export hit. Today, the Land Rover is at home all over the world.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Vive la différence: the cars of Renault are always unusual in design, exceptional in their driving comfort and often avant-gardistic. Renault writes history with the Dauphine, R4, R5 and R16 models.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: From the very beginning, Citroën celebrated the joy of extravagance. Already the Traction Avant from the 1950s is a milestone in automotive history and the 2CV is one of the most unusual and charming small cars ever built.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The Volkswagen Golf is nothing more but a reasonable car - there's nothing really exciting about it, but still it's a mega-seller. The Golf is compatible with the masses and dominates the compact car class since its market introduction.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Be it the 24 Hours of Le Mans, the Monte Carlo Rally or Formula 1: Porsche won it all at least once. Even the first prototype was a race winner, and the successes of the Spyder in the Carrera Panamericana or the Targa Florio are unforgettable.

programme.title: Creme 21 Youngtimer Rally 2019
programme.desc: Welcome to the 80s, the period in time in which there were only three skin creams and three television programs on air and Tuesday night was Dallas night. Car enthusiasts can feel like they’re back in those times once a year at the Creme 21 classic car rally.

programme.title: Chevrolet Corvair
programme.desc: Despite a production number of nearly 1.4 million units the Chevrolet Corvair is virtually unknown in Europe. It was innovative, efficient, modern and cheap. Nevertheless, it was slandered, torn apart and later reviled.

programme.title: Top10 Show
programme.desc: We show what's hot and what's not in the car world. This time we focus on the fastest cars.

programme.title: Top10 Show
programme.desc: Real luxury, the kind of cars most people can only dream of. We present the most expensive production cars.

programme.title: Top10 Show
programme.desc: We present the ten heaviest cars. But there are not only heavy bodies or big vans to see. We have a few surprises up our sleeves.

programme.title: Top10 Show
programme.desc: Day after day, the research and development departments of car manufacturers are working to make their upcoming models unique. We present the ten most unusual cars of the last few years.

programme.title: Top10 Show
programme.desc: The 24-hour race at Germany's Nürburgring is one of the most famous and dangerous endurance races in the world. We show those cars that have won the most titles.

programme.title: Top10 Show
programme.desc: Fuel prices continue to rise. That's why in this episode we present ten of the most fuel-efficient cars in the world.

programme.title: Peugeot 205 Turbo 16
programme.desc: Peugeot released this classic, all wheel drive monster for one purpose only: It should bring the World Rally Championship to France. The Peugeot 205 Turbo 16 shook up the rally world in the 80s.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: McLaren is one of the most famous automobile brands from Great Britain. There are hardly any sports cars that fascinate as much as a McLaren or have such a legendary heritage in motorsports. Two recent models from McLaren are the 650S and the limited series P1. Supercars is in the mood for love and dates the McLaren 650S at an old industrial area and on the race track.

programme.title: Bentley Bentayga
programme.desc: With the Bentley Bentayga, the traditional British brand is entering the fastest growing market segment. This world's first luxury SUV is a conglomerate of superlatives on wheels.

programme.title: Mercedes Sprinter, 2018
programme.desc: The Mercedes Sprinter belongs to the class of commercial vehicles. The light transporter is the dream for every tradesman. The third generation Sprinter is sleeker, more modern and more variable than ever.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The Indy 500 is one of the most spectacular racing events in the world. More than 400.000 spectators watch this mixture of show and motorsports competition at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway each year. We take a look back at the 1994 Indy 500.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: Since its premiere in 1970 the Deutsche Rallye Meisterschaft has been one of the most popular motorsports series. In the 1983 competition Opel's Manta, Kadett and Ascona sports models celebrated exceptional successes.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: In 1985 Audi made their impressive mark in motorsports with the Quattro. With its 4x4 drive this model impressed the audience and shocked the competition alike and ushered in a new era in rally sports.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: After more than 20 years of abstinence Mercedes-Benz return to the Grand Prix circuit in 1954. With a lot of ambition, the company's advanced engineering and some of the best drivers in the world the Mercedes team aimed for the championship.

programme.title: Historic Formula V
programme.desc: In the late fifties in America, the first Formula V racers were produced. The goal: Affordable motor sport for everyone. The small, open wheel cars were seen on the race tracks until the end of the 70s. Then the series was stopped. About 20 years ago a couple of Formula V owners came together and established the "Historic Formula V Europe" as an association.

programme.title: Ken Block at the Monza Rallye Show
programme.desc: In Monza, Ken Block is set to compete against Allstars from motorsport at the Monza Rally Show.

programme.title: MOTORVISION.TV #SPOTTED
programme.desc: Frank Slopianka, a US car dealer from Berlin, takes about eleven seconds to finish the quarter mile race at the drag racing event Race@Airport with his 700-hp Camaro. And: the tuning company Mansory promises even more power for Lamborghini cars.

programme.title: MOTORVISION.TV #SPOTTED
programme.desc: The Nürburgring is the most dangerous, yet the most beautiful race track in the world and meeting point for racing icons and car rarities. The annual Sport1 Track Day lures thousands of petrol heads to the iconic track.

programme.title: MOTORVISION.TV #SPOTTED
programme.desc: Ola Stenegard, Head of Vehicle Design at BMW Motorrad, meets world-famous motorcycle customizers in Los Angeles. Also: we present the craziest 'homemade supercars' such as the Fahrradi Farfalla FFX, the slowest sports car in the world.

programme.title: Lancia Stratos HF
programme.desc: The Lancia Stratos with Ferrari power, the rally icon of the 1970s.

programme.title: BMW M6 Gran Coupe
programme.desc: The M6 Gran Coupe is the latest creation from BMW's M-works subdivision. The Bavarians show that driving this V8 powered car almost feels like flying, even with the whole family on board.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The G-Power M5 Hurricane RS Touring is one of the fastest station wagons in the world. Also: the Artega GT. And: the Austin FX4.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The company Mechatronik is dedicated to the restoration and refinement of Mercedes-Benz classics. Also: the Nissan 370 Z takes on Porsche Cayman & Co. And: the Chevrolet Camaro and the Mercedes-AMG ML 63.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The MF5 GT, the powerhouse from Wiesmann. What's more: if you're looking for exclusivity and find even the performance of a Mercedes-AMG too low, you've come to the right place. The Brabus company is one of the most famous tuners in the world.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The International Motor Show in Geneva is the first important vehicle fair of the year. Of course, the top class refiners must not be missing. Also: the Mercedes-AMG SL 63. The sixth generation of the SL is more powerful than ever before.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The tuning forge MTM is known for its extremely dynamic, optimally tuned vehicles. What's more: the Nissan Juke-R is a projectile with the dimensions of a cigar box and 485 hp of power.

programme.title: Mercedes-AMG GT S Performmaster
programme.desc: Not far from Stuttgart is the home of the tuner Performmaster who specialize in the performance optimization of Mercedes-AMG models. They turned the already more-than-potent GT S sports car into a beast.

programme.title: Lancia Stratos HF
programme.desc: The Lancia Stratos with Ferrari power, the rally icon of the 1970s.

programme.title: Ken Block - Gymkhana Grid
programme.desc: Spectacular drifts are to be expected when Ken Block visits the Gymkhana Grid.

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region is the destination for thousands of bikers who celebrate their big annual event, the European Bike Week. (Part 1 of 5)

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region is the destination for thousands of bikers who celebrate their big annual event, the European Bike Week. (Part 2 of 5)

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region is the destination for thousands of bikers who celebrate their big annual event, the European Bike Week. (Part 3 of 5)

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region is the destination for thousands of bikers who celebrate their big annual event, the European Bike Week. (Part 4 of 5)

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region is the destination for thousands of bikers who celebrate their big annual event, the European Bike Week. (Part 5 of 5)

programme.title: Harley-Davidson Trio
programme.desc: We took a look at three very different Harley-Davidson models. The versatile Switchback Dyna, the motorized wheelie bike Sportster 72, and the bad-boy motorcycle Softail Slim.

programme.title: KTM 990 Adventure
programme.desc: It's very big and mostly comes in orange: the KTM 990 Adventure. Over rough terrain it's often driven standing up. Today, the 990 is considered the off-road specialist among travel Enduros.

programme.title: Facel Vega Facellia
programme.desc: In the late 1950s, the Facel Vega Facellia was designed to compete with Porsche and Alfa Romeo and open a new market segment for the fledgling French luxury car company.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: BMW and the German racing team X-Raid take part in the Dakar Rally with a transformed Mini Countryman. Also: the Mercedes G63 AMG 6x6, a 6-wheel off-road monster. And: the Kia Sportage feels both at home in the rocky terrain of Sicily and the city.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: City-SUVs are the latest trend in the automotive world. The Subaru XV shows its offroad skills, and the Nissan Juke is taken to the race track in Dubai. And: the Mercedes-AMG and the Audi RS Q3 GLA face each other in the mountains.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The Land Rover Defender is one of the oldest offroad car models. We took a look at this iconic vehicle and 70 years of Land Rover history. Also: we took the Range Rover Evoque, the most recent model of the British brand, to the legendary Silk Road.

programme.title: Mitsubishi Lancer Evo 10
programme.desc: The ice course on Lungauring, the Mitsubishi Lancer Evo 10 in winter training. Twelve participants in six Evos were taught the art of drifting with a four-wheel drive car. We accompanied a student on his first drifting experience.

programme.title: Jeep Renegade
programme.desc: Jeep has been building SUVs since 1942. The Jeep Renegade comes from a traditional home. It is the youngest representative of the family and the most successful.

programme.title: BMW Active Hybrid 7
programme.desc: With the Active Hybrid 7, unlike with its predecessor bearing the same model name, BMW now banks on a full hybrid, which can also be driven solely with electric power.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Winning the iconic Dakar Rally for a record 13 times, Frenchman Stéphane Peterhansel had a rather unusual career as he switched from motorbikes to cars and was enormously successful with both vehicles.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Alois Ruf is the founder of a small, but well-known car manufacturing company in Bavaria that specialises in building their own vision of street legal super sports cars on the foundation of Porsche bodys.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: From the 1950s to 1970s Hans Herrmann came to fame as a successful Formula 1 and sportscar driver for manufacturers like Porsche, Mercedes-Benz and Maserati who also won also the 24 Hours of Le Mans several times.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: People called her the "Queen of the Nordschleife" when she used to drive her Porsche or BMW racing cars at the Nürburgring's famous Nordschleife. Sabine Schmitz was a successful racing driver before she took a career turn by working as a TV presenter.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The Pikes Peak Hill Climb is a rather unique type of car race in the mountains of Colorado, USA. It's exciting, tough and dangerous, and in 1987, two-time world rally champion Walter Röhrl took his Audi Sport Quattro S1 to the top.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: In the 1930s the famous Silver Arrows by Auto Union that were designed by Ferdinand Porsche celebrated great successes at the European Drivers' Championship and several Grand Prix races despite the strong competition by Mercedes-Benz.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The International Championship for Manufacturers was a rally series which was run from 1970 to 1972. Car manufacturers such as Porsche, Renault, Opel and Ford took part in this competition, with Ford having an exceptionally successful year in 1972.

programme.title: Mercedes 300 SL Lightweight
programme.desc: An iconic racing car and one of only 29 ever built! We accompanied the Mercedes 300 SL 'lightweight' on its premiere drive at the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Bentley Mulsanne EWB
programme.desc: The long version of the Bentley Mulsanne is a prime example of a chauffeured limousine. With it, the British luxury car brand has set the bar extremely high when it comes to automotive comfort.

programme.title: WSOP 2004 Main Event Day 1A
programme.desc: Day 1A of the 2004 WSOP Main Event is underway with Daniel Negreanu, Men "The Master" Nguyen, and John Hennigan on the feature table. Defending champion Chris Moneymaker kicks off his title defense, while several big names find themselves heading home early.

programme.title: WSOP 2004 Main Event Day 1B
programme.desc: Coverage continues on Day 1B of the WSOP Main Event, and last year's runner-up Sammy Farha headlines the feature table along with John Juanda. Chris Ferguson and "Miami" John Cernuto then join the feature table action, as many poker pros hit the rail on Day 1B.

programme.title: WSOP 2004 Main Event Day 2
programme.desc: Day 2 action in the WSOP Main Event sees Doyle Brunson headline the feature table along with Scott Fischman. Siblings Howard Lederer and Annie Duke are eliminated, along with two previous Main Event champions.

programme.title: Poker Masters 2021 Episode 1
programme.desc: The 2021 Poker Masters is underway with Event #1 seeing seven players return and David Peters in control as the chip leader. Peters sits ahead of Brock Wilson, Shannon Shorr, Jonathan Jaffe, Dylan DeStefano, John Riordan, and Ben Yu as they play for the $205,000 first-place prize.

programme.title: Poker Masters 2021 Episode 2
programme.desc: Sean Perry leads the Event #2 final table while John Riordan returns to sit at his second final table of the series. Also in contention are Jeremy Ausmus, Jake Schindler, Sam Soverel, and Daniel Negreanu as the final six play for the $206,400 first-place prize.

programme.title: Poker Masters 2021 Episode 3
programme.desc: The game changes to Pot-Limit Omaha at the 2021 Poker Masters with Matthew Wantman holding the lead. Chris Brewer, Jake Daniels, Adam Hendrix, Brent Roberts, and Jake Schindler are all in the mix for the $186,300 first-place prize.

programme.title: Poker Masters 2021 Episode 4
programme.desc: Brekstyn Schutten holds the lead in Event #4 over the final six players as $189,800 awaits the winner. Trailing Schutten are Chad Eveslage, Nick Petrangelo, Sam Soverel, Elio Fox, and Brock Wilson.

programme.title: FRIDAY NIGHT POKER WEEK 5
programme.desc: Watch a replay of the fifth Friday Night Poker cash game! Barstool Smitty, Jennifer Tilly, Uncle Ron, The Manz, Sam Simmons, and Jordan Young headline an entertaining $5/$10 cash game. Jeff Platt and Brent Hanks call the action!

programme.title: U.S. Poker Open 2021 Episode 3
programme.desc: Relive entire final tables of the 2021 U.S. Poker Open and watch the likes of Jake Daniels, Sam Soverel, Joe McKeehen, John Riordan, Joey Weissman, Eli Elezra, David Peters, Jared Bleznick, Ali Imsirovic, Sean Winter, and David Peters win U.S. Poker Open titles.

programme.title: WSOP 2004 Main Event Day 3
programme.desc: Money day has arrived in the WSOP Main Event with just 277 players remaining on Day 3. Gus Hansen takes center stage on the feature table, and is joined by Daniel Alaei and Dan Harrington while two other previous champions also survive the day.

programme.title: WSOP 2004 Main Event Day 4
programme.desc: Just 149 players remain in the 2004 WSOP Main Event, and Mike Matusow headlines the feature table alongside Greg "Fossilman" Raymer and John Esposito. However, it would be John Murphy, Josh Arieh, and Marcel Luske climbing to the top of the leaderboard.

programme.title: WSOP 2004 Main Event Day 5
programme.desc: World Champions Dan Harrington and Chris Ferguson headline the feature table on Day 5 of the WSOP Main Event. The only other former champion wouldn't survive, as Doyle Brunson was eliminated.

programme.title: WSOP 2004 Main Event Day 6 (Part 1)
programme.desc: Just 50 players return on Day 6 of the WSOP Main Event as Marcel Luske headlines the feature table along with John Murphy. On the outer tables, Josh Arieh and David Williams begin their run up the leaderboard, while previous champions Chris Ferguson and Dan Harrington remain in contention as just 32 players remain.

programme.title: FRIDAY NIGHT POKER WEEK 6
programme.desc: "Watch a replay of the sixth Friday Night Poker cash game! Kelly Minkin, Bryan Piccioli, Marle Cordeiro, Lilou Agostini, Frank Kassela, and Justin Young headline an spooky $5/$10 cash game. Jeff Platt, Brent Hanks, and Amanda Leatherman call the action, with a guest appearance from Daniel Negreanu! "

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 2

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 3
programme.desc: Phil Galfond makes his Poker Night in America debut playing $25/$50/$100. Lineup: MJ Gonzales, Adam Hendrix, Phil Galfond, Bob Mather, Nick Vertucci, Jeremiah Williams. Commentary by Phil Galfond & Lon McEachern.

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 4
programme.desc: It's LADIES NIGHT at Studio 52 and we're playing $25/$50+. This is one of the most unpredictable tables we've ever had. Featuring Lily Kiletto, Farah Galfond, Hayley Hanna, Christina 'BabyShark' Gollins, Aiza Sison & Lynn Banks! Commentary by Phil Galfond & Lon McEachern.

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 5

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 8

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 9

programme.title: Twitch Celebrity Cash Game - Part 1 - It Begins
programme.desc: We collect the best poker streamers from Twitch.tv, as well as a few notable Vegas pros, to host our first ever Twitch Celebrity Cash Game. From a secret location in Las Vegas, NV we find out if the streamers can hang with the live players...or vise versa...featuring Dan O'Brian, Phil Laak, Randy Lew, Jason Somerville, Antonio Esfandiari, Jaime Staples, Scott Ball, and Bertrand Grosspellier

programme.title: Twitch Celebrity Cash Game - Part 2 - Rampage
programme.desc: Our exclusive Twitch Celebrity Cash Game is in full swing, and the only thing more outrageous than the personalities is the pot sizes. From a private residence living room in Las Vegas, NV, this is cash game poker at its most entertaining. Featuring Dan O'Brian, Phil Laak, Randy Lew, Jason Somerville, Antonio Esfandiari, Jaime Staples, Scott Ball, and Bertrand Grosspellier

programme.title: Twitch Celebrity Cash Game - Part 3 - The Kissing Bet
programme.desc: The Twitch Celebrity Cash Game in Las Vegas barrels on into the night as our curated collection of Twitch streamers and Vegas pros swap chips and insults. Featuring Dan O'Brian, Phil Laak, Randy Lew, Jason Somerville, Antonio Esfandiari, Maria Ho, Jaime Staples, Scott Ball, and Bertrand Grosspellier

programme.title: Twitch Celebrity Cash Game - Part 4 - "Damn, Daniel!"
programme.desc: As word gets around Las Vegas that our cash game is in full swing, some notable players stop by and try and get in. Featuring Daniel Negreanu, Dan O'Brian, Phil Laak, Randy Lew, Jason Somerville, Antonio Esfandiari, Maria Ho, Jaime Staples, Scott Ball, and Bertrand Grosspellier.

programme.title: Twitch Celebrity Cash Game - Part 5 - Psychic Flow
programme.desc: The poker from Las Vegas continues apace, and Phil Laak channels the psychic energy of the universal overmind to hone his poker play. Featuring Daniel Negreanu, Dan O'Brian, Phil Laak, Randy Lew, Jason Somerville, Antonio Esfandiari, Maria Ho, Jaime Staples, Scott Ball, and Bertrand Grosspellier

programme.title: Twitch Celebrity Cash Game - Part 6 - Aces On The Felt, Aces That Fly
programme.desc: After losing the biggest pot in Poker Night history, Antonio Esfandiari is slowing regaining ground. Can he continue to build his stack against the best online and live players in Vegas? Featuring Daniel Negreanu, Dan O'Brian, Phil Laak, Randy Lew, Jason Somerville, Antonio Esfandiari, Maria Ho, Jaime Staples, Scott Ball, and Bertrand Grosspellier

programme.title: WPT Bellagio Cup V - Part 1

programme.desc: La acción en Las Vegas continúa como lo que podría ser la mesa final de WPT más dura jamás calentada en busca de un día de pago de un millón de dólares.

programme.title: WPT Bellagio Cup V - Part 3
programme.desc: La Bellagio Cup V se precipita hacia su explosiva conclusión, ya que cuatro jugadores permanecen en la búsqueda del primer brazalete WPT de la temporada.

programme.title: WPT Legends of Poker - Part 1
programme.desc: Los veteranos del póker Toto Leonidas y Prahlad Friedman lideran el ataque en la mesa final de las leyendas de póker, ya que seis profesionales de póker van después de un título de WPT y un día de pago de un millón de dólares.

programme.title: WPT Legends of Poker - Part 2
programme.desc: El evento principal de Legends of Poker se precipita hasta una emocionante conclusión en Los Ángeles mientras cuatro jugadores luchan por ser el último hombre de pie y el orgulloso propietario del premio Million Dollar First Lugar.

programme.title: WPT Borgata Poker Open - Part 1
programme.desc: El campo más grande de la historia de World Poker Tour produce una mesa final con una de las mayores personalidades del WPT que jamás, que Jeremy Brown, que habla de diversión, que habla basura, habla basura, intenta intimidar su camino hacia una victoria en el WPT.

programme.title: WPT Borgata Poker Open - Part 2
programme.desc: La basura que habla al neoyorquino Jeremy Brown continúa haciendo un espectáculo mientras se acelera a sus oponentes en un camino aparentemente imparable hacia una de las victorias más dominantes en la historia del WPT.

programme.title: WPT Festa al Lago - Part 1
programme.desc: El dos veces campeón del WPT, Freddy Deeb, regresa a la mesa final de Bright Lights of the World Poker Tour en busca de una tercera victoria esquiva y otro día de pago de un millón de dólares.

programme.title: WPT Festa al Lago - Part 2
programme.desc: High Stakes Tournament Poker puede ser un juego cruel y este episodio del WPT demuestra cuán voluble puede ser Lady Luck.

programme.title: WPT Foxwoods World Poker Finals - Part 1
programme.desc: "Madman" Soheil Shamseddin regresa al WPT Arena más loco que nunca y listo para jugar su camino hacia un título de WPT.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 464 - Up Next Fighting 14 part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 14 part 3 from the Commerce Hotel and Casino in Southern California, for an episode packed with action. Up first, Connor Leste and Jason Jones take to the cage in the welterweight division followed by Eden Ibarra versus Gregor Balkian and Atilla Errett versus Amin Derakhshan. In a battle of the Big Island Hawaii, Jake Babian and Kealii Kanekoa step into the cage in the welterweight division while the Somali Sniper Shafii Farah takes on Kester Abad in a flyweight battle.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 430- Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 1 from the Traian Aena in Râmnicu Vâlcea, Romania for a great night of fights. Up first in the middle weight division Denis Ceausu faces Andrei Varga. In the open weight division with a huge weight differential Rodrigo Mineiro, kickboxing world champion takes on boxer Bogdan Bestea for a boxing versus kickboxing contest. Watch as Alex Leautaund of the Netherlands takes on Romania's Mihai Desrobitu in a cruiserweight boxing bout.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 433 - Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 2 from the Traian Aena in Râmnicu Vâlcea, Romania for a great night of fights. First up, a Superfight in the welterweight division, Bogdan Floristean versus Ionel Balan. In the women's lightweight division Maria Nitescu takes on Andreea Cebuc to determine the Baddest Woman in Romania. Also on this episode in the open division Tibor Varga of Hungary steps into the ring with Romania's Bogdan Nastase in a David versus Goliath duel.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 437 - Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 3 from the Traian Aena in Râmnicu Vâlcea, Romania for a great night of boxing and kickboxing fights. In the welterweight division Vinicius Bereta takes on Valentin Mavrodin in a Brazil versus Romania bout. In the open weight division Tolea Ciumac steps into the ring with Valentin Lambagiu with 100 pounds and over 20 years difference between the two fighters for a David versus Goliath duel. In the main event, Portugal's Iuri Fernandes faces Romania's Bogdan Stoica, with a stunning 58 wins to his name, in the Heavyweight division.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 379 - Bare Knuckle Boxing 36 Part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Bare Knuckle Boxing 36 part 1 from London. Starting us off is a match between Jonny "The Zombie" Lawson and Ryan McCann and in a female bout, with both fighters making their BKB debut is Stephanie Dy versus Danni Lee. Also faceing off are Tyrone Eliffe and Richard Samuels and George Taylor and Andrei Nastac take to the ring to battle it out in a heavyweight bare knuckle match.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 380 - Bare Knuckle Boxing 36 Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Bare Knuckle Boxing 36 part 2 from London. Watch as Kamil Sokolowski and Bri Morrow trade punches in a challenging matchup. Peter Hayes and Adam Grogan face off in the ring and Tony Barratt takes on Ryan Barrett. Also Ionel Levitchi of Romania and George Hillyard from London take to the ring.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 381 - Bare Knuckle Boxing 36 Part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Bare Knuckle Boxing 36 part 3 from London. Dan Gittens and Marcin "Psycho" Kosiak step into the ring while Eryk Majda faces Kevin Greenwood with the British heavyweight title on the line. Romanian Bogdan Suru takes on Welsh Ash Williams and in the main event, two BKB veterans Scott McHugh and Tony Lafferty head to the ring for the World Flywieght Title.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 390 - Muay Thai For Life 8 Part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Muay Thai for Life 8.0 part 1 from Sweden at the Rondo Liseberg Center. Starting off in the lightweight division Filip "El Capitan" Lindgren from Stockholm faces hometown favorite Noak Wollsater in a rematch. In the female division, watch as two time Swedish kickboxing champion Joanna Camacho gets into the ring with Janet Kling, two time Swedish Muay Thai silver medalist while Oscar Lindkvist and Simon Vinterskog from rival gyms take to the ring. Also tonight Peter Wallin, K1 champion, takes on Andreas Hall in the light heavyweight division.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 391 - Muay Thai For Life 8 Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Muay Thai for Life 8.0 part 2 from Sweden at the Rondo Liseberg Center. Starting off this episode in the middleweight division Cedrik Von Heiroth faces opponent Viktor Schiller. In a female bout, Ewin Ates and Lisa Larsson both with no defeats take to the ring and Sam Wingqvist is matched up against Sam Ghoroghi in a lightweight match.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 392 - Muay Thai For Life 8 Part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Muay Thai for Life 8.0 part 3 from Sweden at the Rondo Liseberg Center. Buckle up for a brawl in the super heavyweight division as Swedish Muay Thai champion Mattias Lundkvist takes on Zvonimir Kralj "The Croatian Sensation." Also on this episode Alexander Jansson faces Muay Thai champ Poramin Atsa in a middle weight bout while in the co-main event, Colombia's Nico Sanabria takes on Amir El-Dakkak. In the main event Denmark's Youssef Assouik, multiple World Champion, takes on Anton Sjoqvist, Muay Thai World Champion from Stockholm in the super middleweight division.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 464 - Up Next Fighting 14 part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 14 part 3 from the Commerce Hotel and Casino in Southern California, for an episode packed with action. Up first, Connor Leste and Jason Jones take to the cage in the welterweight division followed by Eden Ibarra versus Gregor Balkian and Atilla Errett versus Amin Derakhshan. In a battle of the Big Island Hawaii, Jake Babian and Kealii Kanekoa step into the cage in the welterweight division while the Somali Sniper Shafii Farah takes on Kester Abad in a flyweight battle.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 430- Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 1 from the Traian Aena in Râmnicu Vâlcea, Romania for a great night of fights. Up first in the middle weight division Denis Ceausu faces Andrei Varga. In the open weight division with a huge weight differential Rodrigo Mineiro, kickboxing world champion takes on boxer Bogdan Bestea for a boxing versus kickboxing contest. Watch as Alex Leautaund of the Netherlands takes on Romania's Mihai Desrobitu in a cruiserweight boxing bout.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 433 - Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 2 from the Traian Aena in Râmnicu Vâlcea, Romania for a great night of fights. First up, a Superfight in the welterweight division, Bogdan Floristean versus Ionel Balan. Also on this episode in the open division Tibor Varga of Hungary steps into the ring with Romania's Bogdan Nastase in a David versus Goliath duel.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 437 - Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 3 from the Traian Aena in Râmnicu Vâlcea, Romania for a great night of boxing and kickboxing fights. In the welterweight division Vinicius Bereta takes on Valentin Mavrodin in a Brazil versus Romania bout. In the open weight division Tolea Ciumac steps into the ring with Valentin Lambagiu with 100 pounds and over 20 years difference between the two fighters for a David versus Goliath duel. In the main event, Portugal's Iuri Fernandes faces Romania's Bogdan Stoica, with a stunning 58 wins to his name, in the Heavyweight division.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 402 - Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 1 from Targu Jiu, Romania. This episode features an 8 man tournament in the cruiserweight division. The champion will face the challenger in the ISKA world cruiserweight championship. Fighting in the quarter finals are Alessio Sarbu vs Sebastian Lutaniuc, Becali Bodescu vs Marius Rotaru, Costi Mocany vs Danut Hurduc and Alex Virlan vs Ionut Busuioc.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 403 - Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 2 from Targu Jiu, Romania. Continuining the 8 man tournament in the crusierweight division, this episode features the semi-finals. In a SuperFight open weight division bout Vajtan Shanava, Spanish champion for three consecutive years, steps into the ring with Claudiu "The Prince" Badoi, Romanian favorite with a record of 62 wins and 31 by KO.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 404 - Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 3 from Targu Jiu, Romania. This episode features the 8 man tournament final for the DFS crusierweight belt. But first, stepping into the ring are Alexandros Chrysochoidis and Bogdan Nastase with 55 victories, face off in a Superfight in the light heavyweight division. Next up two champions, Calin Petrisor, the defending ISKA champion and Valentin Mavrodin the defending DFS champion take to the ring for a title fight with the ISKA and DFS belt unificaiton on the line in the middleweight division.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 398 - Red Owl BoxFest XI
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Red Owl BoxFest XI from Houston, Texas. In tonights episode Giovanni Marquez trades punches with Thomas Guillemette and in the main event Quinton Randall and Janelson Figueroa Bocachica take to the ring with the WBA Continental USA Welterweight Title on the line.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 351 - KOK 103 World Series Tallinn Part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 103 part 1 from Tallinn, Estonia. Kicking things off tonight Lithuanian Gedminas Justinas takes on Moldova's Sergei Cheles. In back to back female boxing events, Ernesta Kareckaite faces the more experienced Sigrid Kapanen and Aleksandra Dzhikaeva gets in the ring with Karolina Arm. Making his pro debut, Romualdas Auga takes on Aleksandrs Cerkesov.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 352 - KOK 103 World Series Tallinn Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 103 part 2 from Tallinn, Estonia. In a welterweight Grand Prix, Raimondas Avlasevicius faces Roman Jarysh in the first semi-final fight and in the second semi-final fight Dzianis Makouski joins Marko Sults in the ring with the winner moving on to the Grand Prix finals in the co-main event. Also in this episode, in a very evenly matched bout, Aleh Moshnin and Henry Rohtla face off in the ring.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 353 - KOK 103 World Series Tallinn Part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 103 part 3 from Tallinn, Estonia. In tonight's episode in a middleweight bout Richardas Kulis of Lithuania fights Aleksei Larin from Estonia. In a bantamweight championship female fight, Ilona Wojda and Astrid Grents battle it out for the title. Also Ukranian Volodymyr Hynzhu faces Estonia's Hendrik Themas.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 366 - Shamrock FC 351
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Shamrock Fighting Championship 351 from St. Louis, Missouri. First up, in the women's division, Hannah Lavely and Danielle Thomason step into the cage for a kickboxing bout and Jose Intriago takes on Nuriel Henry in a featherweight clash. In the co-main event, Carl Jefferson faces Matt Tinker in a kickboxing bout and in the main event Lucas Cassius Clay gets in the cage with veteran Cody Carrillo.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 465 - KOK Bushido 93 Vilnius part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents KOK Bushido 93 part 2 from Vilnius, Lithuania. In this episode in the light heavyweight division, Timur Chalbajev and Tautvydas Sarkauskas face off while Mindaugas Bartlis amd Robertas Gunoa step into the cage for a middle weight bout. In the lightweight division, grappling legend Adem Vashakmadze takes on Sergej Grecicho who is looking for a quick end to the fight. In the main event, Cedric Severac and Raimondas Krilavicius face off in a lightweight bout for the chance to fight in the KOK world championship title fight.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 402 - Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 1 from Targu Jiu, Romania. This episode features an 8 man tournament in the cruiserweight division. The champion will face the challenger in the ISKA world cruiserweight championship. Fighting in the quarter finals are Alessio Sarbu vs Sebastian Lutaniuc, Becali Bodescu vs Marius Rotaru, Costi Mocany vs Danut Hurduc and Alex Virlan vs Ionut Busuioc.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 403 - Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 2 from Targu Jiu, Romania. Continuining the 8 man tournament in the crusierweight division, this episode features the semi-finals. In a SuperFight open weight division bout Vajtan Shanava, Spanish champion for three consecutive years, steps into the ring with Claudiu "The Prince" Badoi, Romanian favorite with a record of 62 wins and 31 by KO.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 344 - Up Next Fighting (UNF) 8 - Wassmer vs. Lua
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 8 from Southern California. In this episode, Kester Abad faces Dylan Stockard in a flyweight bout and Daniel Labastida and Matheus Santos face off in a bantamweight contest. Also watch as David Babakhanyan takes on Daniel Gualajara and in the main event, Elwig Wassmer, defending title holder and a biochemist looks to take on Israel Lua (Ben Jones camp) with knockout power, in what's expected to be a combustible fight with two titles on the line. The fighters contend for both the UNF flyweight title and the California state championship title.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 347 - Up Next Fighting (UNF) 9 Part 1 - Rivera vs. Wang-Kim
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 9 from Southern California. In a heavyweight bout Sean Sharaf takes on Nathan Mullett and Anthony Romero faces Brandon Aviles. The main event features a title fight between Cisco Rivera with 10 KO's and Contender Series Josh Wang Kim in the bantamweight division.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 359 - Up Next Fighting (UNF) 9 Part 2 - Lilley vs. Strader
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 9 part 2 from Southern California. In this episode after a confrontational weigh in Jesse Strader faces Ryan Lilley in the featured bout. Also watch Jake Babian versus Emanuel Graham, Weston Quiroz looks to take the title from featherweight reigning champion Hamzeh Trad and in a bantamweight contest David Duran fights Narek Avaguan.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 452 - CMH Boxing I part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents CMH Boxing I part 2 from the Avalon in Hollywood. In the women's division, Brook Sibrian of California takes on the younger Rubi Gutierriz out of Mexico. In the co-main event, Victor Pisillas is set to meet the challenge with Carlos Jackson in a crossroads fight.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 363- Up Next Fighting 11 - Flyweight Championship Part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 11, the Flyweight Championship, from Southern California. In this episode Jason Edwards and Joseph Rodriguez face off in a featherweight fight. In the women's division Auttumn Norton steps into the cage with Brittney Victoria for a Northern California versus Southern California matchup. In the featured bout former boxer Narek Avagyan and Gianni Vasquez vye for the Flyweight Championship Title.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 367 - Up Next Fighting 11 - Middleweight Championship Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 11, the Middleweight Championship, from Southern California. In this episode of UFA, wrestler Armen Piloyan faces striker Diego Perez in a lightweight clash and Steven O'Bryant steps into the cage with Anthony Zaragosa. In the main event challenger Sidiah Parker looks to take the belt from the current champion Curtis Millender. Special guest appearance from the youngest ring annoucer in the world, Cameron Michael "Killer Cam" introduces the main event fighters.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 447 - Up Next Fighting 13 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 13 part 1 from the Commerce Hotel and Casino in Southern California. First up, striker Bryen Dao takes on brawler Ferrin Marcelin in the featherweight division and Aiden Ingram steps into the cage with Steve Mora in a bantamweight bout. Also on this card Carlos Figueroa looks to break Artem Afanasenko's undefeated streak. In the main event, Christopher "Taco" Padilla puts his lightweight title on the line when he faces his toughest opponent yet with five time UFC veteran Justin Janyes.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 447 - Up Next Fighting 13 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 13 part 1 from the Commerce Hotel and Casino in Southern California. programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 451 - Up Next Fighting 13 part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 13 part 2 from the Commerce Hotel and Casino in Southern California. Starting off in the bantamweight division, Jonathan Powell steps into the cage with veteran grappler Will Holguin. In a featherweight bout, striker Jonny O'Neill takes on wrestler Eudardo Zarate with the winner moving on to a title opportunity. Also watch as Adam Garcia and Zachary Kraschinsky take to the ring in a lightweight bout. With two titles on the line in the featured bout, the rising star UNF Featherweight title and the California State featherweight title in the rising stars division, Stone Lavelle and his opponient Sean Crenshaw battle it out for the two belts.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 444 - Fightbook Presents: The Butterfly Brawl part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents The Butterfly Brawl part 1 brought to you by Fightbook from the stunning backdrop of The Santa Monica Pier. This charity boxing event brings together elite fighters and the electric energy of the coast in support of the American Cancer Society. In this first episode Julio Tanori from Mexico steps into the ring after a two year haitus with the young Jason "Dynamite" Robledo from California. Also watch as undefeated Isaiah Carr faces the Philllipines' Daniel Lim. In the middleweight division Poland's Eryk Apresyan faces Terrell "The Sharpshooter" Adams.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 449 - Fightbook Presents: The Butterfly Brawl part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents The Butterfly Brawl part 1 brought to you by Fightbook from the stunning backdrop of The Santa Monica Pier. This charity boxing event brings together elite fighters and the electric energy of the coast in support of the American Cancer Society. In part two, starting off with the co-main event Vlad "Superbad" Panin 21-2 steps into the ring with John Vincent Moralde from the Phillipines. Next up, Brandon Mendoza faces Deni Davtian and topping off the night, the main event features a women's matchup with the hometown favorite and rising star Chantel Navarro taking on two time world champion Nancy Franco.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 463 - KOK Bushido 93 Vilnius part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents KOK Bushido 93 part 1 from Vilnius, Lithuania. First up in the featherweight division, Vladislav Jud faces Pavelas Majauskas followed by Luuk Valk versus Emilis Panceris. Valts Volkolakovs and Adomas Razma face off in the lightweight division in a semi-pro bout and in the light heavyweight division, Antioine Abou Chadid faces Kristupas Simkus.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 465 - KOK Bushido 93 Vilnius part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents KOK Bushido 93 part 2 from Vilnius, Lithuania. In this episode in the light heavyweight division, Timur Chalbajev and Tautvydas Sarkauskas face off while Mindaugas Bartlis amd Robertas Gunoa step into the cage for a middle weight bout. In the lightweight division, grappling legend Adem Vashakmadze takes on Sergej Grecicho who is looking for a quick end to the fight. In the main event, Cedric Severac and Raimondas Krilavicius face off in a lightweight bout for the chance to fight in the KOK world championship title fight.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 450 - DMG Boxing presents Night of Champions IV part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents DMG Boxing Night of Champions IV part 1 from The Fox Theater in Pomona, Califorinia. Starting off the night, Adan Gonzales out of Denver takes to the ring in a southpaw matchup with Dedrick Crocklem of Seattle with a 3-0 record. Also on this card, Samuel Isak takes on Chris Pacheco making his pro-debut. Watch as veteran boxer Vaughn Alexander returns to the DMG ring from St. Louis to take on unstoppable Ruben Cazales with a record of 12-0 and 11 KO's in a super middleweight battle.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 453 - DMG Boxing presents Night of Champions IV part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents DMG Boxing Night of Champions IV part 2 from The Fox Theater in Pomona, California. Starting off with a female bout, undefeated fighters Olympian Brianda Cruz and Susana Lopez step into the ring to fight for their perfect record. In the main event is another battle of the undefeated as David Romero takes on Pedro Valencia who is coming off of a three year hiatus.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 420 - Dynamite Fighting Show 25 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 25 part 1 from Oradea, Romania. Starting in the heavyweight division, Remus Bortea is matched up against Vasile Corcodel whose three wins are all by KO. In a Superfight middleweight division bout, Darius Argyo takes on Andrei "The Bonecrusher" Varga in what's expected to be a fast paced bout. Also in this episode is Brazil versus Romania with two very experienced fighters, Rodrigo Mineiro takes on Claudio "The Prince" Badoi in an open weight division fight.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 421 - Dynamite Fighting Show 25 part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 25 part 2 from Oradea, Romania. In the Super Middleweight division Steven Mendes from France takes on Romania's more experienced Andrei Ostrovanu with 42 wins (24 by KO). In an ISKA Cruiserweight World Title match, Vasileios Karagkiozis and Sebastian Lutanic vie for the belt in a Greece versus Romania bout. Also, in an open weight division Tolea Ciumac and Bogdan Nastase face off in a David versus Goliath match

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 422 - Dynamite Fighting Show 25 part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 25 part 3 from Oradea, Romania. Up first in an ISKA Super Middleweight World Title match, Vinicius Bereta of Brazil takes on Adrian Maxim of Romania with the belt on the line. In the Colossal Division with a total of 723 pounds in the ring, Cristian Anheliuc and Sandu Lungu face off. The ISKA Super Middleweight Wordl title is on the line when Camaroon's Brice Kombou takes on Romania's Andrei Leustean.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 444 - Fightbook Presents: The Butterfly Brawl part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents The Butterfly Brawl part 1 brought to you by Fightbook from the stunning backdrop of The Santa Monica Pier. This charity boxing event brings together elite fighters and the electric energy of the coast in support of the American Cancer Society. In this first episode Julio Tanori from Mexico steps into the ring after a two year haitus with the young Jason "Dynamite" Robledo from California. Also watch as undefeated Isaiah Carr faces the Philllipines' Daniel Lim. In the middleweight division Poland's Eryk Apresyan faces Terrell "The Sharpshooter" Adams.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 449 - Fightbook Presents: The Butterfly Brawl part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents The Butterfly Brawl part 1 brought to you by Fightbook from the stunning backdrop of The Santa Monica Pier. This charity boxing event brings together elite fighters and the electric energy of the coast in support of the American Cancer Society. In part two, starting off with the co-main event Vlad "Superbad" Panin 21-2 steps into the ring with John Vincent Moralde from the Phillipines. Next up, Brandon Mendoza faces Deni Davtian and topping off the night, the main event features a women's matchup with the hometown favorite and rising star Chantel Navarro taking on two time world champion Nancy Franco.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 463 - KOK Bushido 93 Vilnius part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents KOK Bushido 93 part 1 from Vilnius, Lithuania. First up in the featherweight division, Vladislav Jud faces Pavelas Majauskas followed by Luuk Valk versus Emilis Panceris. Valts Volkolakovs and Adomas Razma face off in the lightweight division in a semi-pro bout and in the light heavyweight division, Antioine Abou Chadid faces Kristupas Simkus.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 465 - KOK Bushido 93 Vilnius part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents KOK Bushido 93 part 2 from Vilnius, Lithuania. In this episode in the light heavyweight division, Timur Chalbajev and Tautvydas Sarkauskas face off while Mindaugas Bartlis amd Robertas Gunoa step into the cage for a middle weight bout. In the lightweight division, grappling legend Adem Vashakmadze takes on Sergej Grecicho who is looking for a quick end to the fight. In the main event, Cedric Severac and Raimondas Krilavicius face off in a lightweight bout for the chance to fight in the KOK world championship title fight.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 450 - DMG Boxing presents Night of Champions IV part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents DMG Boxing Night of Champions IV part 1 from The Fox Theater in Pomona, Califorinia. Starting off the night, Adan Gonzales out of Denver takes to the ring in a southpaw matchup with Dedrick Crocklem of Seattle with a 3-0 record. Also on this card, Samuel Isak takes on Chris Pacheco making his pro-debut. Watch as veteran boxer Vaughn Alexander returns to the DMG ring from St. Louis to take on unstoppable Ruben Cazales with a record of 12-0 and 11 KO's in a super middleweight battle.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 453 - DMG Boxing presents Night of Champions IV part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents DMG Boxing Night of Champions IV part 2 from The Fox Theater in Pomona, California. Starting off with a female bout, undefeated fighters Olympian Brianda Cruz and Susana Lopez step into the ring to fight for their perfect record. In the main event is another battle of the undefeated as David Romero takes on Pedro Valencia who is coming off of a three year hiatus.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 420 - Dynamite Fighting Show 25 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 25 part 1 from Oradea, Romania. Starting in the heavyweight division, Remus Bortea is matched up against Vasile Corcodel whose three wins are all by KO. In a Superfight middleweight division bout, Darius Argyo takes on Andrei "The Bonecrusher" Varga in what's expected to be a fast paced bout. Also in this episode is Brazil versus Romania with two very experienced fighters, Rodrigo Mineiro takes on Claudio "The Prince" Badoi in an open weight division fight.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 421 - Dynamite Fighting Show 25 part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 25 part 2 from Oradea, Romania. In the Super Middleweight division Steven Mendes from France takes on Romania's more experienced Andrei Ostrovanu with 42 wins (24 by KO). In an ISKA Cruiserweight World Title match, Vasileios Karagkiozis and Sebastian Lutanic vie for the belt in a Greece versus Romania bout. Also, in an open weight division Tolea Ciumac and Bogdan Nastase face off in a David versus Goliath match

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 422 - Dynamite Fighting Show 25 part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 25 part 3 from Oradea, Romania. Up first in an ISKA Super Middleweight World Title match, Vinicius Bereta of Brazil takes on Adrian Maxim of Romania with the belt on the line. In the Colossal Division with a total of 723 pounds in the ring, Cristian Anheliuc and Sandu Lungu face off. The ISKA Super Middleweight Wordl title is on the line when Camaroon's Brice Kombou takes on Romania's Andrei Leustean.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 454 - Up Next Fighting 14 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 14 part 1 from the Commerce Hotel and Casino in Southern California. In the flyweight division Daniel Labastida faces Zain Palacio, Pargev Khachatrian steps into the cage with Israel Salazar and Matthew Ingram takes on Arshag Dadourian. In the main event, with the UNF welterweight title on the line Anthony Desimon looks to take the belt from Christopher London.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 443 - Clan Wars 52 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Clan Wars 52 part 1 from Belfast, Ireland. In this episode Conor McDermott faces Callum Carville in the light heavyweight division and in a female bout, Caitlyn Dunne takes on Gemma Coghill. Also in a featherweight match Cesar Correia steps into the cage with Omar Al Haj while Tristan Barnett and Nicolae Schiopu battle it out in the welterweight division. The main event is a featherweight title fight between Michael Cartmill and Nathan Chambers.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 455 - Clan Wars 52 part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Clan Wars 52 part 2 from Belfast, Ireland. In this episode Nick Rebreanu faces Valerio Balestri in the welterweight division while Jean Kamalli and Billy Sutherland take to the cage. Kyle Paton and Jamie McCaugherty vie for the vacant superlightweight title and in the main event in the heavyweight division Simon Sackey faces Mahdi Zooashna.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 456 - Dynamite Fighting Show 27 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 27 part 1 from Transylvania, Romania. Starting off with a superfight in the lightweight division, Bogdan Floristean faces Ionut Popa and in the middleweight division, Dominik Horvath takes on Andrei "The Bonecrusher" Varga. Also stepping into the cage are Brazilian Rodrigo Mineiro and Romanian Florin Lambagiu.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 458 - Dynamite Fighting Show 27 part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 27 part 2 from Transylvania, Romania. In this episode Fernando Martin from Spain and Romania's Andrei Leustean face off in a super middleweight division bout. Next up the co-main event in the heavyweight division, Hungary's Sandor Kertesz takes on Romania's Bogan Stoica. In the main event USA's Omar Moreno steps into the ring with hometown favorite Andrei Ostravanu for a rematch in a supermiddleweight fight.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 402 - Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 1 from Targu Jiu, Romania. This episode features an 8 man tournament in the cruiserweight division. The champion will face the challenger in the ISKA world cruiserweight championship. Fighting in the quarter finals are Alessio Sarbu vs Sebastian Lutaniuc, Becali Bodescu vs Marius Rotaru, Costi Mocany vs Danut Hurduc and Alex Virlan vs Ionut Busuioc.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 403 - Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 2 from Targu Jiu, Romania. Continuining the 8 man tournament in the crusierweight division, this episode features the semi-finals. In a SuperFight open weight division bout Vajtan Shanava, Spanish champion for three consecutive years, steps into the ring with Claudiu "The Prince" Badoi, Romanian favorite with a record of 62 wins and 31 by KO.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 404 - Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 3 from Targu Jiu, Romania. This episode features the 8 man tournament final for the DFS crusierweight belt. But first, stepping into the ring are Alexandros Chrysochoidis and Bogdan Nastase with 55 victories, face off in a Superfight in the light heavyweight division. Next up two champions, Calin Petrisor, the defending ISKA champion and Valentin Mavrodin the defending DFS champion take to the ring for a title fight with the ISKA and DFS belt unificaiton on the line in the middleweight division.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 398 - Red Owl BoxFest XI
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Red Owl BoxFest XI from Houston, Texas. In tonights episode Giovanni Marquez trades punches with Thomas Guillemette and in the main event Quinton Randall and Janelson Figueroa Bocachica take to the ring with the WBA Continental USA Welterweight Title on the line.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 351 - KOK 103 World Series Tallinn Part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 103 part 1 from Tallinn, Estonia. Kicking things off tonight Lithuanian Gedminas Justinas takes on Moldova's Sergei Cheles. In back to back female boxing events, Ernesta Kareckaite faces the more experienced Sigrid Kapanen and Aleksandra Dzhikaeva gets in the ring with Karolina Arm. Making his pro debut, Romualdas Auga takes on Aleksandrs Cerkesov.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 352 - KOK 103 World Series Tallinn Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 103 part 2 from Tallinn, Estonia. In a welterweight Grand Prix, Raimondas Avlasevicius faces Roman Jarysh in the first semi-final fight and in the second semi-final fight Dzianis Makouski joins Marko Sults in the ring with the winner moving on to the Grand Prix finals in the co-main event. Also in this episode, in a very evenly matched bout, Aleh Moshnin and Henry Rohtla face off in the ring.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 353 - KOK 103 World Series Tallinn Part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 103 part 3 from Tallinn, Estonia. In tonight's episode in a middleweight bout Richardas Kulis of Lithuania fights Aleksei Larin from Estonia. In a bantamweight championship female fight, Ilona Wojda and Astrid Grents battle it out for the title. Also Ukranian Volodymyr Hynzhu faces Estonia's Hendrik Themas.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 366 - Shamrock FC 351
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Shamrock Fighting Championship 351 from St. Louis, Missouri. First up, in the women's division, Hannah Lavely and Danielle Thomason step into the cage for a kickboxing bout and Jose Intriago takes on Nuriel Henry in a featherweight clash. In the co-main event, Carl Jefferson faces Matt Tinker in a kickboxing bout and in the main event Lucas Cassius Clay gets in the cage with veteran Cody Carrillo.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 352 - KOK 103 World Series Tallinn Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 103 part 2 from Tallinn, Estonia. In a welterweight Grand Prix, Raimondas Avlasevicius faces Roman Jarysh in the first semi-final fight and in the second semi-final fight Dzianis Makouski joins Marko Sults in the ring with the winner moving on to the Grand Prix finals in the co-main event. Also in this episode, in a very evenly matched bout, Aleh Moshnin and Henry Rohtla face off in the ring.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 353 - KOK 103 World Series Tallinn Part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 103 part 3 from Tallinn, Estonia. In tonight's episode in a middleweight bout Richardas Kulis of Lithuania fights Aleksei Larin from Estonia. In a bantamweight championship female fight, Ilona Wojda and Astrid Grents battle it out for the title. Also Ukranian Volodymyr Hynzhu faces Estonia's Hendrik Themas.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 366 - Shamrock FC 351
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Shamrock Fighting Championship 351 from St. Louis, Missouri. First up, in the women's division, Hannah Lavely and Danielle Thomason step into the cage for a kickboxing bout and Jose Intriago takes on Nuriel Henry in a featherweight clash. In the co-main event, Carl Jefferson faces Matt Tinker in a kickboxing bout and in the main event Lucas Cassius Clay gets in the cage with veteran Cody Carrillo.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 465 - KOK Bushido 93 Vilnius part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents KOK Bushido 93 part 2 from Vilnius, Lithuania. In this episode in the light heavyweight division, Timur Chalbajev and Tautvydas Sarkauskas face off while Mindaugas Bartlis amd Robertas Gunoa step into the cage for a middle weight bout. In the lightweight division, grappling legend Adem Vashakmadze takes on Sergej Grecicho who is looking for a quick end to the fight. In the main event, Cedric Severac and Raimondas Krilavicius face off in a lightweight bout for the chance to fight in the KOK world championship title fight.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 402 - Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 1 from Targu Jiu, Romania. This episode features an 8 man tournament in the cruiserweight division. The champion will face the challenger in the ISKA world cruiserweight championship. Fighting in the quarter finals are Alessio Sarbu vs Sebastian Lutaniuc, Becali Bodescu vs Marius Rotaru, Costi Mocany vs Danut Hurduc and Alex Virlan vs Ionut Busuioc.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 403 - Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 2 from Targu Jiu, Romania. Continuining the 8 man tournament in the crusierweight division, this episode features the semi-finals. In a SuperFight open weight division bout Vajtan Shanava, Spanish champion for three consecutive years, steps into the ring with Claudiu "The Prince" Badoi, Romanian favorite with a record of 62 wins and 31 by KO.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 404 - Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 24 part 3 from Targu Jiu, Romania. This episode features the 8 man tournament final for the DFS crusierweight belt. But first, stepping into the ring are Alexandros Chrysochoidis and Bogdan Nastase with 55 victories, face off in a Superfight in the light heavyweight division. Next up two champions, Calin Petrisor, the defending ISKA champion and Valentin Mavrodin the defending DFS champion take to the ring for a title fight with the ISKA and DFS belt unificaiton on the line in the middleweight division.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 398 - Red Owl BoxFest XI
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Red Owl BoxFest XI from Houston, Texas. In tonights episode Giovanni Marquez trades punches with Thomas Guillemette and in the main event Quinton Randall and Janelson Figueroa Bocachica take to the ring with the WBA Continental USA Welterweight Title on the line.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 351 - KOK 103 World Series Tallinn Part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 103 part 1 from Tallinn, Estonia. Kicking things off tonight Lithuanian Gedminas Justinas takes on Moldova's Sergei Cheles. In back to back female boxing events, Ernesta Kareckaite faces the more experienced Sigrid Kapanen and Aleksandra Dzhikaeva gets in the ring with Karolina Arm. Making his pro debut, Romualdas Auga takes on Aleksandrs Cerkesov.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 352 - KOK 103 World Series Tallinn Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 103 part 2 from Tallinn, Estonia. In a welterweight Grand Prix, Raimondas Avlasevicius faces Roman Jarysh in the first semi-final fight and in the second semi-final fight Dzianis Makouski joins Marko Sults in the ring with the winner moving on to the Grand Prix finals in the co-main event. Also in this episode, in a very evenly matched bout, Aleh Moshnin and Henry Rohtla face off in the ring.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 353 - KOK 103 World Series Tallinn Part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 103 part 3 from Tallinn, Estonia. In tonight's episode in a middleweight bout Richardas Kulis of Lithuania fights Aleksei Larin from Estonia. In a bantamweight championship female fight, Ilona Wojda and Astrid Grents battle it out for the title. Also Ukranian Volodymyr Hynzhu faces Estonia's Hendrik Themas.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 344 - Up Next Fighting (UNF) 8 - Wassmer vs. Lua
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 8 from Southern California. In this episode, Kester Abad faces Dylan Stockard in a flyweight bout and Daniel Labastida and Matheus Santos face off in a bantamweight contest. Also watch as David Babakhanyan takes on Daniel Gualajara and in the main event, Elwig Wassmer, defending title holder and a biochemist looks to take on Israel Lua (Ben Jones camp) with knockout power, in what's expected to be a combustible fight with two titles on the line. The fighters contend for both the UNF flyweight title and the California state championship title.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 347 - Up Next Fighting (UNF) 9 Part 1 - Rivera vs. Wang-Kim
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 9 from Southern California. In a heavyweight bout Sean Sharaf takes on Nathan Mullett and Anthony Romero faces Brandon Aviles. The main event features a title fight between Cisco Rivera with 10 KO's and Contender Series Josh Wang Kim in the bantamweight division.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 359 - Up Next Fighting (UNF) 9 Part 2 - Lilley vs. Strader
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 9 part 2 from Southern California. In this episode after a confrontational weigh in Jesse Strader faces Ryan Lilley in the featured bout. Also watch Jake Babian versus Emanuel Graham, Weston Quiroz looks to take the title from featherweight reigning champion Hamzeh Trad and in a bantamweight contest David Duran fights Narek Avaguan.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 452 - CMH Boxing I part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents CMH Boxing I part 2 from the Avalon in Hollywood. In the women's division, Brook Sibrian of California takes on the younger Rubi Gutierriz out of Mexico. In the co-main event, Victor Pisillas is set to meet the challenge with Carlos Jackson in a crossroads fight.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 363- Up Next Fighting 11 - Flyweight Championship Part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 11, the Flyweight Championship, from Southern California. In this episode Jason Edwards and Joseph Rodriguez face off in a featherweight fight. In the women's division Auttumn Norton steps into the cage with Brittney Victoria for a Northern California versus Southern California matchup. In the featured bout former boxer Narek Avagyan and Gianni Vasquez vye for the Flyweight Championship Title.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 367 - Up Next Fighting 11 - Middleweight Championship Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 11, the Middleweight Championship, from Southern California. In this episode of UFA, wrestler Armen Piloyan faces striker Diego Perez in a lightweight clash and Steven O'Bryant steps into the cage with Anthony Zaragosa. In the main event challenger Sidiah Parker looks to take the belt from the current champion Curtis Millender. Special guest appearance from the youngest ring annoucer in the world, Cameron Michael "Killer Cam" introduces the main event fighters.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 447 - Up Next Fighting 13 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 13 part 1 from the Commerce Hotel and Casino in Southern California. First up, striker Bryen Dao takes on brawler Ferrin Marcelin in the featherweight division and Aiden Ingram steps into the cage with Steve Mora in a bantamweight bout. Also on this card Carlos Figueroa looks to break Artem Afanasenko's undefeated streak. In the main event, Christopher "Taco" Padilla puts his lightweight title on the line when he faces his toughest opponent yet with five time UFC veteran Justin Janyes.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 447 - Up Next Fighting 13 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 13 part 1 from the Commerce Hotel and Casino in Southern California. programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 451 - Up Next Fighting 13 part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 13 part 2 from the Commerce Hotel and Casino in Southern California. Starting off in the bantamweight division, Jonathan Powell steps into the cage with veteran grappler Will Holguin. In a featherweight bout, striker Jonny O'Neill takes on wrestler Eudardo Zarate with the winner moving on to a title opportunity. Also watch as Adam Garcia and Zachary Kraschinsky take to the ring in a lightweight bout. With two titles on the line in the featured bout, the rising star UNF Featherweight title and the California State featherweight title in the rising stars division, Stone Lavelle and his opponient Sean Crenshaw battle it out for the two belts.
