programme.title: Play It Forward - The Garden State
programme.desc: Hammer, Cheese, and TNT trade in the wood-grain for the ice rink in Chicago. Jet, Hotshot, and Cheese encourage literacy in Harlem. Hammer shares the inspirational story of his childhood injury and how he recovered. Hosted by Craig Robinson.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Sweet Georgia Brown
programme.desc: Thunder invites Jet and Bulldog to Red Hot Chili Pepper Flea’s Conservatory of Music to discover how he keeps the study of music alive for the kids of LA. TNT and Thunder visit Speedy at a local community center to learn about his youth basketball league and train some special athletes. And the science behind Jet’s Granny Shot taken at Harlem’s world-famous Rucker Park. Kenny Smith hosts.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - World Records Ep. 2
programme.desc: A collection of world records broken by the Harlem Globetrotters.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Pull the Strings
programme.desc: Torch, Ace and TNT mentor a special group of girls in Atlanta. Wham brings Thunder, Coach Lou, his elementary school teacher and her class to a museum in Atlanta where they learn about the art of puppetry. And TNT doesn't look twice as she sinks an amazing shot in New York's famous Rucker Park. Kenny Smith Hosts.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Global Heart Warming
programme.desc: Jet brings Cheese, Hotshot, and Hops to a Los Angeles shelter to cook for their residents. Torch revisits her past and shows love to the family that raised her. Plus, Thunder reunites with a very special fan.

programme.title: Harlem Globetrotters World Tour - Raleigh 2024
programme.desc: All the dunks, alley-oops, looooong shots, magic, history and laughs from the world-famous Harlem Globetrotters. This game was played in PNC Arena in Raleigh, NC.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Trotters of the Caribbean
programme.desc: The Globetrotters visit a school in the Dominican Republic teaching kids the virtues of harvesting their own crops, recount the history of their beloved "magic circle".

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Trick Shots Ep. 3
programme.desc: Amazing trick shots from the Harlem Globetrotters.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Ballerinas, Dancers, And... Globetrotters?
programme.desc: The Globetrotters head to Jet's hometown to support him where he's being honored, enlighten high schoolers on the values of entrepreneurship, crash a kids' dance class to learn about Cuban ballet and visit Iceland's Blue Lagoon.

programme.title: Play It Forward - The Race For Inclusion
programme.desc: The Globetrotters learn about an organization that builds playgrounds for kids of all abilities; how a NASCAR racing school is driving for diversity in the sport; meeting one of the NASCAR pit mechanics.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Assisting the Home Team
programme.desc: Torch surprises her high school girls' basketball team with new equipment; the team visits an organization in Chicago where they meet asylum seekers transitioning into U.S. life; Hammer surprises viral sensation Zeke "The Trick Shot Kid" in Georgia.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Pups and Puppets
programme.desc: Wham brings Thunder, Coach Lou, his elementary school teacher and her class to a museum in Atlanta where they learn about the art of puppetry. Jet and Wham visit a dog rescue in LA that specializes in saving and finding homes for pugs. And Wham shoots an amazing trick shot in Tennessee. Kenny Smith hosts.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Friends Make Family
programme.desc: Hotshot, Wham and Cheese head to New Orleans to visit a program that mentors kids through the gift of music. TNT and Ace join Torch as she visits her alma mater to mentor the girl’s basketball team.. A young fan is granted the opportunity to ask a Globetrotter whatever she wishes. And we break down the science behind an extraordinary “Hotshot” performed at Venice Beach. Kenny Smith hosts.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Trick Shots Ep. 2
programme.desc: Amazing trick shots from the Harlem Globetrotters.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Celebrities Ep. 6
programme.desc: The Globetrotters spend the day with YouTuber Faze Rug.

programme.title: Harlem Globetrotters World Tour - Greenville 2017
programme.desc: All the dunks, alley-oops, looooong shots, magic, history and laughs from the world-famous Harlem Globetrotters. This game was played at the Bon Secours Wellness Arena in Greenville, SC.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Trick Shots Ep. 7
programme.desc: Amazing trick shots from the Harlem Globetrotters.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Blast Off!
programme.desc: Jet, Wham, and Hotshot teach some South Central LA youth about the benefits of sports and exercise. Cheese and TNT visit NASA's Kennedy Space Center to learn how teamwork gets a rocket to the moon and back. And Bulldog shares a tribute to his most important mentor and inspiration: his older brother. Hosted by Craig Robinson.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Show & Sail
programme.desc: The Globetrotters travel to Chicago to learn about organizations that teach diversity in the sport of sailing; they head to Topeka, Kan. and the history of the Showman.

programme.title: Harlem Globetrotters World Tour - Salt Lake City 2024
programme.desc: All the dunks, alley-oops, looooong shots, magic, history and laughs from the world-famous Harlem Globetrotters. This game was played in the Delta Center in Salt Lake City, UT.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Trick Shots & Tea Parties
programme.desc: Wham, Cheese and Hammer learn about the construction industry; Torch, Hammer, and Hot Shot head to Broward, Florida, to meet The Embrace Girls Foundation; a nonprofit encouraging at-risk girls and uplifting tea parties.; Thunder throwback to his trick shot gauntlet at an abandoned warehouse.; Torch, Hammer, Wham, and Hot Shot take an unforgettable journey to Australia. Hosted by Craig Robinson.

programme.title: Harlem Globetrotters World Tour - Chicago 2019
programme.desc: All the dunks, alley-oops, looooong shots, magic, history and laughs from the world-famous Harlem Globetrotters. This game was played in Chicago, IL in 2019.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Globetrotters Player Tribute Ep. 1
programme.desc: A tribute to Harlem Globetrotters players from past and present.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Brotherly Love
programme.desc: Speedy invites Thunder and Bulldog to his hometown of Philadelphia to give back to a barber known for providing haircuts to the homeless. Jet and Coach Lou tell the history of the Globetrotter's storied rivals, the Washington Generals. And Speedy hits the famous courts of Harlem's Rucker Park to break down a one-of-a-kind trick shot. Kenny Smith hosts.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Celebrities Ep. 2
programme.desc: A collection of celebrity interactions with the Harlem Globetrotters including tennis star Nick Kyrgios, astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson, singer Justin Bieber and quarterback Carson Wentz.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Community Compassion
programme.desc: Torch and Cheese learn about the importance of mentorship for teens in the tech industry. Wham, Bulldog, and Hotshot fulfill a major need for a south central Los Angeles after-school program. Bulldog, Jet, and Hotshot learn about the value of financial literacy while discovering the game of golf. Cheese heads home to the Bronx to revisit his roots.

programme.title: My Rookie Season - My Rookie Season Ep. 3
programme.desc: The annual Harlem Globetrotters Training Camp welcomes new rookies while fans get a look behind the curtain to see what it takes to make the team and what it truly means to be a Harlem Globetrotter.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Drum & Pedals
programme.desc: Coach Lou brings Thunder and Torch to Philadelphia where they meet a young man who is dedicated to fixing and providing bikes to the underserved. Then Wham, Thunder, and Hammer head to New Orleans to meet kids that have fallen in line to learn the drumline. A young fan is granted the opportunity to ask a Globetrotter whatever she wishes. And the science behind Jet's Granny Shot taken at Harlem's world-famous Rucker Park. Kenny Smith hosts.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Jumping Back Into Action
programme.desc: Hotshot and X-Over teach basketball to kids with dwarfism at the DAAA Games. The team helps foster care children transitioning into new homes. Wham surprises his cousin with a skydiving experience with a veteran-supporting organization.

programme.title: Harlem Globetrotters World Tour - Saginaw 2024
programme.desc: All the dunks, alley-oops, looooong shots, magic, history and laughs from the world-famous Harlem Globetrotters. This game was played in Sagniaw, MI in 2025.

programme.title: Harlem Globetrotters World Tour - American Dream East Rutherford 2024
programme.desc: All the dunks, alley-oops, looooong shots, magic, history and laughs from the world-famous Harlem Globetrotters. This game was played at the American Dream in East Rutherford, NJ.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Handles with Care
programme.desc: Thunder and crew head to Iceland where they experience the famous Blue Lagoon. Torch revisits her past and shows love to the family that raised her. The team visits a center in Los Angeles started by the family of a renowned TV actor that caters to the needs of children on the spectrum.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Globetrotters History Ep. 2
programme.desc: Celebrating the legacy of the Harlem Globetrotters with iconic profiles and unforgettable moments as we journey through decades of dazzling skills, humor, and global impact.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Dunks Ep. 1
programme.desc: The best dunks from the Harlem Globetrotters.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Good Eats
programme.desc: Cheese, Bulldog, Hot Shot, and Jet meet with local D.C. youth to support their mission for clean water and self-reliance. TNT, Torch, Wham, and Hammer learn about cooking nutritious meals through a healthy competition. Thunder and the Globetrotters perform for a special crowd in Chile and meet with the Chilean Minister of Sports and a deserving group of local children. TNT supports Torch from the sidelines of one of the fastest growing sports for women, flag football.

programme.title: Quick Cuts - Best Young Athletes: 75 Years of Globetrotter Magic
programme.desc: This video features highlights and introductions to some of the most talented and athletic Harlem Globetrotters players. It showcases their incredible skills, unique athleticism, and entertaining performances, emphasizing their dedication, character, and the legacy of the team. The Globetrotters demonstrate jaw-dropping moves, impressive vertical jumps, and their signature showmanship, celebrating their milestone of 20,000 games played worldwide.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Guinness Greatness: Harlem Globetrotters in the Record Books
programme.desc: Get ready for jaw-dropping, record breaking trick shots as the world famous Harlem Globetrotters set out to break numerous Guinness World Records.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Precision Perfect Unreal Trick Shots
programme.desc: From rooftop buckets to no-look swishes, witness a masterclass in creativity, control, and jaw-dropping precision. No CGI. No second takes. Just raw talent and unbelievable trick shots that push the limits of what's possible.

programme.title: Harlem Globetrotters World Tour - Detroit 2002
programme.desc: All the dunks, alley-oops, looooong shots, magic, history and laughs from the world-famous Harlem Globetrotters. This game, from 2002, was played in Detroit, MI.

programme.title: Play It Forward - A Routine Haircut
programme.desc: Wham, Too Tall and Torch team up with gymnast Nia Dennis to inspire a diverse group of young gymnasts in Pasadena; Speedy invites Thunder and Bulldog to his hometown of Philadelphia to give back to a barber who provides haircuts to the homeless.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Surf and Soul
programme.desc: The Globetrotters line dance their way into the hearts of an amazing community in Tennessee, hit the beach with some amazing foster kids and their chosen family, and pay homage to their loyal fans; Bulldog breaks down his famous hook shot.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Finding your Groove
programme.desc: Torch, Ace and TNT mentor a special group of girls in Atlanta. Coach Lou brings Thunder and Torch to Philadelphia where they meet a young man who is dedicated to fixing and providing bikes to the underserved. TNT and Ace dance their way into the hearts of a group of young girls in Harlem. And we break down the mechanics of a spectacular trick shot taken by Ace in Tennessee. Kenny Smith hosts.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Welcome Home
programme.desc: The Globetrotters help a deserving family win a brand new home. Cheese and TNT empower inner-city youth who are fighting back against violence. The Globetrotters pay tribute to their legendary teammate Meadowlark Lemon. Hosted by Craig Robinson.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Dancing is good for the Soul
programme.desc: TNT and Thunder visit Speedy to learn about his youth basketball league and train some special athletes. TNT and Ace dance their way into the hearts of a group of young girls in Harlem. Thunder and Bulldog line dance their way into the hearts of an amazing community in Nashville. And Speedy hits the famous courts of Harlem's Rucker Park to break down a one-of-a-kind trick shot. Kenny Smith hosts.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Rare Air
programme.desc: The Globetrotters perform for service members and their families during a visit to Moody Air Force Base in Georgia; Thunder pays a visit to his hometown of Chesapeake, Virginia; the team learns the benefits of verse with "Street Poets.

programme.title: Play It Forward - On The Waterfront
programme.desc: Bulldog joins Jet and his daughter to discover the secrets of marine conservation at Hampton Beach. Then, TNT alongside Jet and his daughter realize just how precious the simple things are on the shores of Sebago Lake. And Thunder proves his vertical lift is as impressive as ever. Kenny Smith Hosts.

programme.desc: The team visits a Charlotte organization that teaches kids literacy with the help of soccer. Wham visits his hometown of Stone Mountain, GA to reconnect with family, friends, and his favorite childhood teacher. Coach Lou teaches Thunder some Spanish before a tour stop in Mexico and later assists Coach Handles in helping the players cultivate their skills at the annual Showman's camp in Atlanta.

programme.desc: Hammer, Bulldog, and TNT travel to Phoenix to help empower and motivate local youth at a renowned afterschool program. Bulldog, Jet, and Hotshot learn about the value of financial literacy while discovering the game of golf. Globetrotter Max 'Hops' Pearce unveils his unique artwork. TNT gets help from Wham in her search for a family dog. Hosted by Craig Robinson.

The team plays a classic playground game with some champion little leaguers. programme.title: Quick Cuts - Mr. Basketball’s Journey: 75 Years of Globetrotter Magic
programme.desc: This documentary-style content chronicles the rich history and legacy of the Harlem Globetrotters, from their founding in 1926 to their rise as world-class athletes and entertainers. It highlights their groundbreaking 1948 victory over the Minneapolis Lakers, which helped legitimize black athletes in professional basketball. The story focuses on Mannie Jackson, a former player turned executive, who saved the team from extinction in the 1990s and revitalized their global brand. The Globetrotters’ influence on basketball, their unique blend of comedy and athleticism, and their philanthropic efforts around the world are also showcased, cementing their place as an iconic basketball and entertainment institution.

Director, Velma Lawrence, and her incredible girls at Arcola Elementary School host the players for their traditional uplifting tea parties. Thunder and the Globetrotters perform for a special crowd in Chile and meet with the Chilean Minister of Sports and a deserving group of local children.

programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at part of the Globetrotters 2017 season.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Dunks Ep. 3
programme.desc: The best dunks from the Harlem Globetrotters.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Globetrotters History Ep. 4
programme.desc: Celebrating the legacy of the Harlem Globetrotters with iconic profiles and unforgettable moments as we journey through decades of dazzling skills, humor, and global impact.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Trick Shots Ep. 7
programme.desc: Amazing trick shots from the Harlem Globetrotters.

programme.title: Play It Forward - The Art of the Game
programme.desc: TNT spends time with family in her adopted hometown of Charlotte, NC; Hot Shot takes Wham to an aquarium in Kentucky that preserves aquatic wildlife. Coaches Lou and Handles help players cultivate their skills at the annual Showman’s camp in Atlanta.

programme.title: Harlem Globetrotters World Tour - Green Bay 2023
programme.desc: All the dunks, alley-oops, looooong shots, magic, history and laughs from the world-famous Harlem Globetrotters. This game was played in The Resch Center in Ashwaubenon, WI.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Swimming With Whale Sharks
programme.desc: Bulldog, Wham, and TNT join wounded veterans for an extraordinary encounter with whale sharks in Atlanta. Torch and Jet get in the groove as they join a special art education program to remix the Globetrotter theme song. Cheese heads home to the Bronx to revisit his roots. Hosted by Craig Robinson.

programme.title: My Rookie Season - My Rookie Season Ep. 3
programme.desc: The annual Harlem Globetrotters Training Camp welcomes new rookies while fans get a look behind the curtain to see what it takes to make the team and what it truly means to be a Harlem Globetrotter.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Celebrities Ep. 5
programme.desc: A collection of celebrity interactions with the Harlem Globetrotters including magician John Rotellini, NFL great Franco Harris and gymnast Simone Biles.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Beats, Bravery, & Basketball
programme.desc: Aspiring teen-girl music producers teach Jet, Bulldog, Wham, and Cheese how to make some awesome beats. Coach Lou and the players help create greenspace in southside Chicago. Hammer tells an injured young fan the inspirational story of his own childhood injury and how he recovered. And Bulldog shares a tribute to his most important mentor and inspiration: his older brother. Hosted by Craig Robinson.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Big Hopes
programme.desc: The Globetrotters challenge Little Brothers and Little Sisters to an unforgettable basketball game, visit Chicago to meet asylum-seekers transitioning into life in the U.S. and teach basketball skills to kids with dwarfism at the DAAA Games.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Handles with Care
programme.desc: Thunder and crew head to Iceland where they experience the famous Blue Lagoon. Torch revisits her past and shows love to the family that raised her. The team visits a center in Los Angeles started by the family of a renowned TV actor that caters to the needs of children on the spectrum.

programme.title: My Rookie Season - My Rookie Season Ep. 1
programme.desc: The annual Harlem Globetrotters Training Camp welcomes new rookies and fans get a look behind the curtain to see what it takes to make the team and what it truly means to be a Harlem Globetrotter.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - World Records Ep. 1
programme.desc: A collection of world records broken by the Harlem Globetrotters.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Breaking Boundaries And World Records
programme.desc: The women of the Harlem Globetrotters. Plus, jaw-dropping trick shots, slick handles, and unstoppable energy from the Harlem Globetrotters.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Dunks Ep. 1
programme.desc: The best dunks from the Harlem Globetrotters.

programme.title: Harlem Globetrotters World Tour - Minnesota 1997
programme.desc: All the dunks, alley-oops, looooong shots, magic, history and laughs from the world-famous Harlem Globetrotters. This game was from 1997 and played in Minneapolis, MN.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Gone Skydiving
programme.desc: Hammer takes his slam dunk to new heights with a sky-high trick shot. Wham and TNT pay homage to the legendary Globetrotter Coach "Sweet Lou" Dunbar. Coach Lou, Jet, Bulldog, and Hot Shot meet some champion little leaguers in Washington D.C. where they play a twist on a classic game. And the Globetrotters head to the great outdoors for a fishing excursion. Hosted by Craig Robinson.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Hometown Roots
programme.desc: Wham invites his elementary school teacher and her class on a field trip to a wildlife sanctuary in Georgia. Hammer invites Zeus to his adopted hometown of Tampa to enlighten high schoolers on the values of entrepreneurship. Hotshot and Cheese travel to Jet's hometown to support him while he's being honored. And TNT spends quality time with family in her adopted hometown of Charlotte, NC.

programme.title: Harlem Globetrotters World Tour - Dallas 2024
programme.desc: All the dunks, alley-oops, looooong shots, magic, history and laughs from the world-famous Harlem Globetrotters. This game was played in the American Airlines Center in Dallas, TX.

programme.title: Harlem Globetrotters World Tour - Minneapolis 2024
programme.desc: All the dunks, alley-oops, looooong shots, magic, history and laughs from the world-famous Harlem Globetrotters. This game was played in the Target Center in Minneapolis, MN.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Aussie! Aussie! Aussie! Oi! Oi! Oi!
programme.desc: Globetrotters, Wham and TNT, pay homage to the legendary Coach Lou; Torch, Hammer, Wham, and Hot Shot take an unforgettable journey to Australia. Wham and Hammer venture off the court and on to the farm to learn valuable skills in food cultivation and healthy living.

programme.title: Harlem Globetrotters World Tour - Raleigh 2024
programme.desc: All the dunks, alley-oops, looooong shots, magic, history and laughs from the world-famous Harlem Globetrotters. This game was played in PNC Arena in Raleigh, NC.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Art in the Jet
programme.desc: The Globetrotters join a special program that is revitalizing inner city basketball courts. Cheese gets a galactic lesson on what it takes to prepare food for zero gravity. Jet comes in for a landing in his hometown of Elizabeth, New Jersey, where he gives back at a youth basketball camp. And Wham breaks the world record for most between-the-leg dribbles in one minute. Hosted by Craig Robinson.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Brotherly Love
programme.desc: Speedy invites Thunder and Bulldog to his hometown of Philadelphia to give back to a barber known for providing haircuts to the homeless. Jet and Coach Lou tell the history of the Globetrotter's storied rivals, the Washington Generals. And Speedy hits the famous courts of Harlem's Rucker Park to break down a one-of-a-kind trick shot. Kenny Smith hosts.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Old School
programme.desc: The team dazzles in Santo Domingo.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Friends Make Family
programme.desc: Hotshot, Wham and Cheese head to New Orleans to visit a program that mentors kids through the gift of music. TNT and Ace join Torch as she visits her alma mater to mentor the girl’s basketball team.. A young fan is granted the opportunity to ask a Globetrotter whatever she wishes. And we break down the science behind an extraordinary “Hotshot” performed at Venice Beach. Kenny Smith hosts.

programme.title: Play It Forward - The Garden State
programme.desc: Hammer, Cheese, and TNT trade in the wood-grain for the ice rink in Chicago. Jet, Hotshot, and Cheese encourage literacy in Harlem. Hammer shares the inspirational story of his childhood injury and how he recovered. Hosted by Craig Robinson.

programme.title: Quick Cuts - Best Young Athletes: 75 Years of Globetrotter Magic
programme.desc: This video features highlights and introductions to some of the most talented and athletic Harlem Globetrotters players. It showcases their incredible skills, unique athleticism, and entertaining performances, emphasizing their dedication, character, and the legacy of the team. The Globetrotters demonstrate jaw-dropping moves, impressive vertical jumps, and their signature showmanship, celebrating their milestone of 20,000 games played worldwide.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Trick Shots Ep. 9
programme.desc: Amazing trick shots from the Harlem Globetrotters.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Sweet Georgia Brown
programme.desc: Thunder invites Jet and Bulldog to Red Hot Chili Pepper Flea’s Conservatory of Music to discover how he keeps the study of music alive for the kids of LA. TNT and Thunder visit Speedy at a local community center to learn about his youth basketball league and train some special athletes. And the science behind Jet’s Granny Shot taken at Harlem’s world-famous Rucker Park. Kenny Smith hosts.

programme.title: Quick Cuts - World-Record Dunk at Disney: 75 Years of Globetrotter Magic
programme.desc: This video features the Harlem Globetrotters showcasing their legendary basketball skills and entertaining performances. The footage highlights record-breaking moments, fan interactions, and the history of the team, emphasizing their global impact and influence on the sport. From exciting game highlights and interviews with players like Shawn Williams to behind-the-scenes glimpses of their tours and community engagement programs, the video celebrates the Harlem Globetrotters' legacy as the greatest entertainers and ambassadors of basketball. It also touches on their milestone 20,000th game, their brand growth under owner Mannie Jackson, and their commitment to youth through summer basketball camps.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Celebrities Ep. 4
programme.desc: A collection of celebrity interactions with the Harlem Globetrotters including sports columnist Matthew Berry, NBA stars Jason Kidd and Dirk Nowitzki, and rapper Snoop Dogg.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Trick Shots Ep. 2
programme.desc: Amazing trick shots from the Harlem Globetrotters.

programme.title: My Rookie Season - My Rookie Season Ep. 2
programme.desc: The annual Harlem Globetrotters Training Camp welcomes new rookies and fans get a look behind the curtain to see what it takes to make the team and what it truly means to be a Harlem Globetrotter.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Beat Of Their Own Drum
programme.desc: Harlem Globetrotters come together to make some new world records and to take back some old ones. Then Wham, Thunder, and Hammer head to New Orleans to meet kids that have fallen in line to learn the drumline. And we break down the science behind Cheese's famous Granny shot. Kenny Smith hosts.

programme.title: Harlem Globetrotters World Tour - Providence 2025
programme.desc: All the dunks, alley-oops, looooong shots, magic, history and laughs from the world-famous Harlem Globetrotters. This game was played in Providence, RI in 2025.

programme.title: Play It Forward - The Mayor of Harlem
programme.desc: Harlem Globetrotters Hotshot and Cheese provide eager documentary students with an insider's perspective of the hidden stories of Harlem. Coach Lou celebrates one of the best Globetrotters of all time: Geese Ausbie. And Thunder proves his vertical lift is as impressive as ever. Kenny Smith Hosts.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Hope Floats
programme.desc: Torch and Bulldog learn the benefits of Equine therapy at "Shining Hope Farms." Hammer, Torch, Bulldog and Ace travel to Chicago to learn about two organizations that teach diversity in the sport of sailing. Hotshot and Cheese hit the court in LA to challenge some locals to a pickup game.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Surf and Soul
programme.desc: The Globetrotters line dance their way into the hearts of an amazing community in Tennessee, hit the beach with some amazing foster kids and their chosen family, and pay homage to their loyal fans; Bulldog breaks down his famous hook shot.

programme.title: Harlem Globetrotters World Tour - Bismarck 2017
programme.desc: All the dunks, alley-oops, looooong shots, magic, history and laughs from the world-famous Harlem Globetrotters. This game was played at the Bismarck Event Center in Bismarck, ND.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Ballerinas, Dancers, And... Globetrotters?
programme.desc: The Globetrotters head to Jet's hometown to support him where he's being honored, enlighten high schoolers on the values of entrepreneurship, crash a kids' dance class to learn about Cuban ballet and visit Iceland's Blue Lagoon.

programme.title: Harlem Globetrotters World Tour - Detroit 2002
programme.desc: All the dunks, alley-oops, looooong shots, magic, history and laughs from the world-famous Harlem Globetrotters. This game, from 2002, was played in Detroit, MI.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Behind The Scenes Ep. 1
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at part of the Globetrotters 2017 season.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Blazing Ahead
programme.desc: TNT and Torch reminisce on their early days of blazing the trail for a new generation of female Globetrotters; the team visits an Atlanta organization that cultivates Paralympian athletes and a New Orleans program that mentors kids through music.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Bring It Home
programme.desc: The Globetrotters recount the history of their beloved "Magic Circle." Torch surprises her high school girls' basketball team with new equipment. Plus, Thunder pays a visit to his hometown of Chesapeake, VA.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Celebrities Ep. 2
programme.desc: A collection of celebrity interactions with the Harlem Globetrotters including tennis star Nick Kyrgios, astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson, singer Justin Bieber and quarterback Carson Wentz.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - World Records Ep. 2
programme.desc: A collection of world records broken by the Harlem Globetrotters.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Classic Precision
programme.desc: Coach Lou and the players help create green space in Southside Chicago.; Torch and Cheese learn about the importance of mentorship for teens in the tech industry.; Wham and Bulldog uplift a group looking to make a fresh start.; Thunder throwbacks to his trick shot gauntlet at an abandoned warehouse.; Hosted by Craig Robinson.

programme.title: Best of the Harlem Globetrotters - Celebrities Ep. 4
programme.desc: A collection of celebrity interactions with the Harlem Globetrotters including sports columnist Matthew Berry, NBA stars Jason Kidd and Dirk Nowitzki, and rapper Snoop Dogg.

programme.title: Play It Forward - Sweet Georgia Brown
programme.desc: Thunder invites Jet and Bulldog to Red Hot Chili Pepper Flea’s Conservatory of Music to discover how he keeps the study of music alive for the kids of LA. TNT and Thunder visit Speedy at a local community center to learn about his youth basketball league and train some special athletes. And the science behind Jet’s Granny Shot taken at Harlem’s world-famous Rucker Park. Kenny Smith hosts.

programme.title: 2025 Golden Stick Award Race
programme.desc: The Golden Stick Award is an award given to the player who accumulates the most scoring points throughout the Championship Series. In its history, the winner has been on the team who lost the championship title. This year we followed four of the best goal scorers in the world through their quest to be the first player to win the Championship Series trophy and the Golden Stick Award.

programme.title: The Story of Brennan O’Neill
programme.desc: Brennan O’Neill’s rare combination of size, speed, and power has made him one of the most dominant forces in lacrosse. From prodigy to professional, his physical presence has reshaped the game. But as competition intensifies and defenses adjust, this feature explores how dominance is tested at the highest level, and asks one question: Is dominance enough?
