programme.title: Gut Health with Dr. Mary Pardee - Day 10: Test, Don't Guess
programme.desc: For day 10 we learn about the different kinds of tests that give us insight to one's gut symptoms. Knowledge is power!

programme.title: The Wellness Master Class - The Wellness Master Class: Overcoming Overwhelm
programme.desc: Today we learn the first step to dealing with overwhelm - settling firm boundaries.

programme.title: The Wellness Master Class - The Wellness Master Class: Stress
programme.desc: Today’s course walks you through best practices, habits, and mindsets for dealing with stress. Examine your life and identify your stress points, using Brendon’s techniques to release your tension and get back to showing up like you want. Together we’ll prepare for the eventuality of stress by adjusting our relationship with it.

programme.title: The Wellness Master Class - The Wellness Master Class: Cultivating Joy
programme.desc: We experience two types of joy. One is momentary, when something funny happens or a nice word is said in passing and we laugh or smile - for a bit, we’re filled with joy. The other is long term and lasting, sustained by gratitude and a life of meaning and purpose. If we’re waiting on joy to enter our life, we’re not living as connected or congruent as we could be.

programme.title: The Wellness Master Class - The Wellness Master Class: Physiology vs Psychology
programme.desc: Today’s session will focus on the different ways we can care for our body, from better sleep hygiene to eating for sustained well-being. Explore how feeling better can lead you to doing more, and feeling better while doing it.

programme.title: Commune Meditation Summit - CMS - Kimberly Snyder
programme.desc: Today, you will learn how to tap into your unwavering inner knowing, which is also and often called your intuition. Kimberly Synder shares why being connected to your inner source of beauty is so important.

programme.title: Commune Meditation Summit - CMS - Sharon Salzberg
programme.desc: Today, we're going to be talking about opening to joy. Many people, like evolutionary biologists, will say that we are wired to predominantly look for danger, for threats, for what's wrong in our lives, and that it could take some conscious effort, a kind of intentionality, to take in the good and be able to acknowledge it.

programme.title: The Superpowers of Your Gut - The Superpowers of Your Gut - Day 2
programme.desc: You have an intimate relationship with everything you put in your mouth. The tongue is a magical instrument for you to start to remember the power of flavor and nutrients, to slow it down and experience food again.

programme.title: The Superpowers of Your Gut - The Superpowers of Your Gut - Day 1
programme.desc: Human biology is a symphony played between the body and the greater nature around us. The great conductor of that symphony, in many ways, is the gut and microbiome. This course will take a multifaceted look at this organ system � which is our primary interface with the chemistry of the world � so you can get an understanding of how to co-create health and well-being.

programme.title: Yoga For All - Yoga For All Day 1: Notice
programme.desc: Your Day 1 practice offers an invitation to slow down and take stock.

programme.title: Yoga For All - Day 10: Balance
programme.desc: Your day 10 practice starts with a standing warm up and eases into a yoga flow for balance and transformation! Bring calm alertness to the mind and body as you continue to ride the wave of the breath. Build a strong foundation to set yourself up for greatness. Be patient and courageous.

programme.title: Vinyasa for Life - Vinyasa for Life: Twist What You Missed
programme.desc: This vinyasa class transforms the lessons from Day 6 into a series of playful asana. You’ll begin by establishing your base, then focus on twisting variations in Chair Pose (Utkatasana) and Wide-Legged Forward Fold (Prasarita Padottanasana), with a peak in Revolved Half Moon (Parivrtta Ardha Chandrasana).

programme.title: Vinyasa for Life - Day 8: Rhythm
programme.desc: Your day 8 practice invites you to get in tune with your natural rhythm and make it your own.

programme.title: Vinyasa for Life - Vinyasa for Life: This is Your Spine on Yoga
programme.desc: Apply everything you've learned so far in this well-rounded sequence of twists, folds, and heart openers. Some points to remember: Lengthen the spine out of the pelvis before back bending, focus your twists toward the thoracic spine (the middle twelve vertebrae—not your neck or lower back), and discover the essence of a back bend in every forward fold.

programme.title: Balance Your Hormones with Dr. Jolene Brighten - Balance Your Hormones - Day 6: Hack Your Hormones
programme.desc: Regulating your blood sugar is one of the most important things you can do to hack your hormones. Having a balanced blood sugar is not only foundational to hormones, but it’s also critical to our neurotransmitters, the chemicals in your brain that produce the feelings of happiness, sadness, or make us feel energized. If your blood sugar is all over the place, you might not be making the right amounts of serotonin and GABA to keep you feeling happy, chilled out, and calm.

programme.title: The Wellness Master Class - The Wellness Master Class: Overcoming Overwhelm
programme.desc: Today we learn the first step to dealing with overwhelm - settling firm boundaries.

programme.desc: Today’s course walks you through best practices, habits, and mindsets for dealing with stress. Examine your life and identify your stress points, using Brendon’s techniques to release your tension and get back to showing up like you want. Together we’ll prepare for the eventuality of stress by adjusting our relationship with it.

programme.title: The Wellness Master Class - The Wellness Master Class: Cultivating Joy

The other is long term and lasting, sustained by gratitude and a life of meaning and purpose. If we’re waiting on joy to enter our life, we’re not living as connected or congruent as we could be.

programme.desc: Today’s session will focus on the different ways we can care for our body, from better sleep hygiene to eating for sustained well-being. Explore how feeling better can lead you to doing more, and feeling better while doing it.

programme.title: Commune Meditation Summit - CMS - Kimberly Snyder
programme.desc: Today, you will learn how to tap into your unwavering inner knowing, which is also and often called your intuition. Kimberly Synder shares why being connected to your inner source of beauty is so important.

programme.title: Hacking Your Healthcare - Day 9: Detoxification
programme.desc: Today we’ll address the ways different metabolic and environmental toxins make their way into your system and how your body eliminates them. We’ll learn to look for excess buildup of these toxins and how to boost your own ability to process them.

programme.title: Hacking Your Healthcare - Day 8: Metabolism and Mitochondria
programme.desc: What if I told you there was a reason you feel tired, achy, and foggy all the time? And what if I told you the solution was healing your body on the cellular level?

programme.title: Good Mood Food with Jason Wrobel - Fat is Your Friend
programme.desc: Don’t demonize fat. It’s actually your friend! Today, you will learn the importance of the quality of the fat you’re consuming, how to select the right kind of monounsaturated fats that nourish your brain, and why it’s important to choose the right cooking oils.

programme.title: Good Mood Food with Jason Wrobel - Mindfulness Practices for Mealtime
programme.desc: We’ve all heard about the importance of being present—but how does that translate to meal time? Today is all about how to practice presence at every meal by feasting with your other senses first, and how to recognize how food actually makes you feel.

programme.title: Good Mood Food with Jason Wrobel - Energize Your Morning
programme.desc: Well, the secret is about to be out... today you’ll learn all about the real breakfast of champions! Jason talks about the power of intermittent fasting, how to use breathwork techniques and lymphatic pounding to wake up your body, everyday energy-boosting foods to add to your breakfasts.

programme.title: Good Mood Food with Jason Wrobel - Optimize Your Sleep
programme.desc: Do you have trouble sleeping—or just want to enjoy a deeper, more rejuvenating sleep? Today, Jason talks about how to wind down from a stressful day, the foods and nutrients that improve relaxation and sleep, and his supplemental practices and biohacks for sleep hygiene.

programme.title: Good Mood Food with Jason Wrobel - Hormones and Hanger
programme.desc: Today is all about feeling hangry, when you get so hungry, you actually get angry! Jason shares the hormones that affect hanger and how you can be mindful of controlling them. We’ll discuss the importance of proper hydration, blood sugar levels, starvation diets, and weight loss.

programme.title: Hacking Your Healthcare - Day 9: Detoxification
programme.desc: Today we’ll address the ways different metabolic and environmental toxins make their way into your system and how your body eliminates them. We’ll learn to look for excess buildup of these toxins and how to boost your own ability to process them.

programme.title: Hacking Your Healthcare - Day 8: Metabolism and Mitochondria
programme.desc: What if I told you there was a reason you feel tired, achy, and foggy all the time? And what if I told you the solution was healing your body on the cellular level?

programme.title: Relationships with Marianne Williamson - Relationships: The Innocence in Everyone
programme.desc: To truly grasp the concept of forgiveness, we have to be willing to see past the person's mistakes. The benefit we get from being more forgiving isn't that other people are going to be more forgiving towards us, it's that it won't affect us when they aren't.

programme.title: Relationships with Marianne Williamson - Relationships: Special and Holy Relationships
programme.desc: In this lesson, we'll discover the significance of holy relationships. After all, souls are brought together for the purpose of enlightenment.

programme.title: Spiritual Makeover with Marianne Williamson - Spiritual Makeover - Part 1
programme.desc: This is not a religious course; rather, it’s a universal system based on love. You think you have many different problems, but you have only one — the illusion of your separation from God, the true nature of reality. We get trapped in illusions (and create our own suffering) when we over-identify with a particular problem or stay stuck in fear-based thinking. This program is here to remind you of a key universal principle: Only love is real.

programme.title: Spiritual Makeover with Marianne Williamson - Spiritual Makeover - Part 2
programme.desc: It’s time to stand in your power and stop buying into the belief that you are wounded beyond repair. God already created the perfect you, and it's an undeletable file.

programme.title: Road To Dharma - Freedom in the Gap at Tungnath
programme.desc: Emptiness and Power in the Gap. The stunning Tungnath Peak at 13,000 ft, the Feminine Temple above the Masculine. Ken goes from rational doubter to having an experience beyond understanding that relates to his deceased sister. Unfortunately, the experience is tainted by ignorance and the seemingly inspiring day is further marred when Anna has an accident…

programme.title: HEAL
programme.desc: Director Kelly Noonan Gores’ HEAL takes us on a scientific and spiritual journey where we discover that our thoughts, beliefs, and emotions have a huge impact on our health and ability to heal. We have more control over our health and life than we have been taught to believe.

programme.title: Fantastic Fungi: Remastered
programme.desc: Fantastic Fungi Remastered is a breathtaking journey into the hidden world of mycelium. Through stunning imagery and expert insights, the film reveals fungi’s beauty, intelligence, and power to heal, inspire, and offer solutions for our planet’s future.

programme.title: Vinyasa for Life - Vinyasa for Life: Easing into Back Bending
programme.desc: Establish long term success for your practice by learning about one of the most crucial body parts in yoga—your spine. In this class Schuyler teaches you how to backbend safely, followed by three practical applications. Class ends with a soothing restorative posture. Body awareness never felt so good.

programme.title: The Wellness Master Class - The Wellness Master Class: Cultivating Joy
programme.desc: We experience two types of joy. One is momentary, when something funny happens or a nice word is said in passing and we laugh or smile - for a bit, we’re filled with joy. The other is long term and lasting, sustained by gratitude and a life of meaning and purpose. If we’re waiting on joy to enter our life, we’re not living as connected or congruent as we could be.

programme.title: Vinyasa for Life - Vinyasa for Life: Strong Triceps, Open Armpits
programme.desc: Strengthen and open the triceps to deepen your understanding of the upper arms. Your challenge poses for this class are Forearm Plank, Dolphin Pose, and Forearm Stand (Pincha Mayurasana)—and of course Child's Pose is always an option! Creative propwork helps you access these asanas in new and interesting ways.

programme.title: Breath, Body, Beats with Schuyler Grant - Breath, Body, Beats with Schuyler Grant - Day 3: Creating a Powerful Foundation of Flow
programme.desc: Flow is defined as an optimal state of consciousness where we feel our best and perform our best. Also known as “the zone,” this is the mental state in which you are fully immersed in whatever activity you’re doing as you’re doing it, with an energized focus. There’s a pleasurable sense of full engagement in the present moment. When you are so completely absorbed in what you are doing that you lose your sense of space and time. This could also be called mediation in motion. Effortless effort. Vinyasa style yoga is the most direct conduit Schuyler has found to dropping into the flow state. Today, you’ll work with your hands and feet—these areas are imperative in creating a powerful foundation for this challenge and your practice as a whole. Today’s class includes wrist stretches, rolling planks, and illuminating block work designed to increase strength and flexibility.

programme.title: Vinyasa for Life - Vinyasa for Life: Forearms Are Forever
programme.desc: Ready for your forearms to be your best friends? This flow plays with dropped prayer variations, Cow Face Pose (Gomukhasana) arms, and, of course, Forearm Plank and Side Plank. Expect some back-bending Pigeons and flowing Cobras in there as well. End on your back with a solid Bridge Pose (Setu Bandhasana) to close out this sweet and intense practice.

programme.title: Breath, Body, Beats with Schuyler Grant - Breath, Body, Beats with Schuyler Grant - Day 1: Breathing with the Beats
programme.desc: Welcome to Day 1! Congratulations on making this powerful commitment to yourself and giving yourself the gift of flow state. Research shows that if you cultivate the flow state in your daily life, the benefits touch every part of your life—job performance, peace of mind, creativity, and your own sense of purpose. Connecting to the breath is that powerful. Remember that it’s important to have your blocks and yoga blanket or thick towel. If you find yourself empty-handed, you can always DIY your own. In this first class, you will learn key postures and proper shoulder alignment to establish a foundation for this challenge. (Upcoming classes include less talking and more flowing, but this one is important for everything that follows, so stick with it!)

programme.title: The Wellness Master Class - The Wellness Master Class: Setting Intentions with Clarity
programme.desc: Today we learn how to ask those better questions and use the answers to achieve more for ourselves and our community.

programme.title: The Wellness Master Class - The Wellness Master Class: Overcoming Overwhelm
programme.desc: Today we learn the first step to dealing with overwhelm - settling firm boundaries.

programme.desc: In this course, Anita Moorjani guides you toward loving yourself as if your life depends on it – because it does! When love (rather than fear) determines your life, you will recognize what is truly important for you to be happy and healthy.

programme.title: Live Fearlessly with Anita Moorjani - Life Lessons from Almost Dying NEW
programme.desc: Today, Anita shares what her near-death experience taught her about how to live. You’ll discover why everything we have learned through our education system, government, mass media, etc. is the exact opposite of what we should know in order to create a meaningful, joy-filled life.

programme.title: Qigong: The Eight Brocades - Qigong: The Eight Brocades - Day 1
programme.desc: Qigong is considered one of the five branches of Chinese Medicine, a foundational basis for martial arts, and a long-standing spiritual practice revered in Daoist and Zen traditions. In this video, your qigong teacher, Mimi Kuo-Deemer, introduces you to the etymology of qigong and the history of the 8 Silk Brocades you will practice in this course.

programme.title: Balance Your Hormones with Dr. Jolene Brighten - Balance Your Hormones - Day 1: Hormones 101
programme.desc: Your hormones work like a symphony. When every instrument is in tune, they play harmoniously. However, if one instrument is out of tune, or one hormone is out of balance, the entire piece is thrown off. Together, we'll decode your symptoms and work with your body to create hormonal balance. This means clear skin, easier periods, less hot flashes, better sex, and more restful sleep. Yes, it can be that good when your hormones are in check.

programme.title: Thriving Through Midlife & Beyond - Thriving Through Midlife & Beyond - More Life Left Than You Think
programme.desc: Rather than seeing the coming decades as a process of getting inexorably older, what if you instead considered them an extension of the prime of your life? In fact, sociologists today consider midlife lasting as long as 40 years — from 35 to 75. This is a time for thriving and growing whole, not just old.

programme.title: Thriving Through Midlife & Beyond - Thriving Through Midlife & Beyond - From Midlife Crisis to Midlife Chrysalis
programme.desc: Certainly, midlife years can be challenging, but instead of seeing this time as crisis, what if you viewed it instead as a chrysalis? How can you begin the transformation toward a series of vibrant years ahead?

programme.title: Commune Meditation Summit - CMS - Michael B. Beckwith
programme.desc: In this lesson, you will focus on the gift of the body temple, which is the signature for revealing life, love, peace, joy, wisdom, harmony, and abundance. When the body’s temple is healthy, you can hold more energy. More of life’s cosmic energy can flow through you.

programme.title: Live Fearlessly with Anita Moorjani - How to Really Know Yourself
programme.desc: Today, we take a close look at who we really are in order to recognize our purpose, understand our intentions, and recognize our true worth in this world.

programme.title: Live Fearlessly with Anita Moorjani - How to Transcend Fear into Love
programme.desc: We live in a fear-based world. In today’s lesson, Anita offers you tools that have been specially created to overcome your fears with love. This is the greatest lesson she learned during her near-death experience when she traveled to the other side. It’s the lesson that saved her life.

programme.title: Balance Your Hormones with Dr. Jolene Brighten - Balance Your Hormones - Day 1: Hormones 101

This means clear skin, easier periods, less hot flashes, better sex, and more restful sleep. Yes, it can be that good when your hormones are in check.

programme.title: Grounding Into Grace - Jump In With Both Feet
programme.desc: If you want to build a dynamic yoga practice from the ground up, we must start with the feet. This class encourages you to open and awaken the many muscles of the feet before moving through a flowing sequence of standing postures. End class with hamstring lengthening and a gentle, restorative backbend.

programme.title: Grounding Into Grace - Resilient Wrists and Strong Hands
programme.desc: Learning to bear weight intelligently and safely on the hands is a requirement for a sustainable vinyasa yoga practice. This class offers wrist-care strategies and a fair amount of forearm work so that you can enjoy vinyasa for life. Prepare for a bit of burn and the pleasure of learning to be a graceful quadruped.

programme.title: Fantastic Fungi: Remastered
programme.desc: Fantastic Fungi Remastered is a breathtaking journey into the hidden world of mycelium. Through stunning imagery and expert insights, the film reveals fungi’s beauty, intelligence, and power to heal, inspire, and offer solutions for our planet’s future.

programme.title: HEAL
programme.desc: Director Kelly Noonan Gores’ HEAL takes us on a scientific and spiritual journey where we discover that our thoughts, beliefs, and emotions have a huge impact on our health and ability to heal. We have more control over our health and life than we have been taught to believe.

programme.title: A Return To Wholeness - A Return To Wholeness - Understanding Addiction
programme.desc: Addiction is neither a choice you make or an unavoidable disease. It’s an attempt to solve a problem. The conundrum is… it almost works.

programme.title: A Return To Wholeness - A Return To Wholeness - What Are Expressions of Healthy Anger?
programme.desc: Expressions of healthy anger are different from unhealthy anger. Dr. Maté articulates the difference and discusses the increased health risks when healthy anger is repressed.

programme.title: A Return To Wholeness - A Return To Wholeness - What Does Health Look Like?
programme.desc: What is the meaning of health? In this lesson, you’ll learn what health looks like and how to approach healing with compassionate inquiry and healthy disillusionment.

programme.title: Fantastic Fungi: Remastered
programme.desc: Fantastic Fungi Remastered is a breathtaking journey into the hidden world of mycelium. Through stunning imagery and expert insights, the film reveals fungi’s beauty, intelligence, and power to heal, inspire, and offer solutions for our planet’s future.

programme.title: The Highest Pass
programme.desc: Part heart-pounding adventure, part spiritual quest, THE HIGHEST PASS, a feature length documentary, premiered in Los Angeles to sold out audiences. The award-winning film shares the journey of seven seekers, including one who has never ridden a motorcycle, who follow a guru with a Vedic death prophecy on a moto journey up to the highest pass of the Indian Himalayas. Over 21 days and up to an elevation of 18,000 feet along a winding road, they never let low oxygen, altitude sickness, river-flooded roads, icy edges, snow and loaded trucks dampen their spirits or, ultimately, their deeper selves.

programme.title: Road To Dharma - Freedom in the Gap at Tungnath
programme.desc: Emptiness and Power in the Gap. The stunning Tungnath Peak at 13,000 ft, the Feminine Temple above the Masculine. Ken goes from rational doubter to having an experience beyond understanding that relates to his deceased sister. Unfortunately, the experience is tainted by ignorance and the seemingly inspiring day is further marred when Anna has an accident…

programme.title: Road To Dharma - Real Love at Badrinath
programme.desc: Badrinath – Reverberating with thousands of years of yogic wisdom… But Jeff won’t even wear a helmet. You try and talk to him, he won’t listen to me, says Jen. The ebb and flow of relationships and how to sustain them is found here in Badrinath, the temple of Naryana, the sustainer. This isn’t religious, it is all about getting empty and receiving the wisdom of the sages in the great Himalayas.

programme.title: Road To Dharma - True Power in the Hidden Valley of the Flowers
programme.desc: Before Riding to the Hidden Valley of the Flowers, we get a rare view of the hidden life of the riders in this real world of yogis opening scene. This lightness contrasts a big incedent at the the following morning, setting the riders and Ryan up for some harsh truths about Power and passivity. True Power is yours to embrace. This is not a journey to feel better.

programme.title: The Work of Byron Katie - Intro to the Judge-Your-Neighbor Worksheet
programme.desc: As humans, we are constantly struggling between the poles of what we think we want and what is. When we lose touch with the truth of what is, we create and compound our suffering. What narratives are you constructing? Are they in conflict with the truth of the situation? Are you struggling with what is?

programme.title: Commune Meditation Summit - CMS - Michael B. Beckwith
programme.desc: In this lesson, you will focus on the gift of the body temple, which is the signature for revealing life, love, peace, joy, wisdom, harmony, and abundance. When the body’s temple is healthy, you can hold more energy. More of life’s cosmic energy can flow through you.

programme.title: Commune Meditation Summit - CMS - Preethaji
programme.desc: Every one of us, at any point in time, is living in one of two states of being. We are either in a suffering state or we are living in a beautiful state. When you are in a beautiful state of connection, you enter a new realm where synchronicities unfold, where the randomly moving universe arranges itself into patterns to fulfill your heart's desires. Use this meditation practice to manifest heart-felt intentions in your life.

programme.title: Commune Meditation Summit - CMS - Tracee Stanley
programme.desc: In this grounding meditation, allow yourself to let go and relax your mind and body so you can slip into a state of deep rest and rejuvenation.

programme.title: Commune Meditation Summit - CMS - Sharon Salzberg
programme.desc: Today, we're going to be talking about opening to joy. Many people, like evolutionary biologists, will say that we are wired to predominantly look for danger, for threats, for what's wrong in our lives, and that it could take some conscious effort, a kind of intentionality, to take in the good and be able to acknowledge it.

programme.title: Commune Meditation Summit - CMS - Light Watkins
programme.desc: In this lesson with Light Watkins, you will learn to examine bliss as more than a buzzword. You’ll come to see and know it as a powerful state of presence that is accessible through the practice of meditation.

programme.title: Peace of Mind Parenting - Peace of Mind Parenting - Day 1: Positive Parenting in a Pandemic
programme.desc: Today, you'll learn solutions to this work, life, and parenting balancing problem many of us are experiencing during this pandemic. You're never going to be perfectly in balance, particularly during this time. But you’ll learn how to be aligned with your goals, values, and intentions.

programme.title: Peace of Mind Parenting - Peace of Mind Parenting - Day 2: What to Do When Your Child is Stressed
programme.desc: Today, we shift our thinking. We view these behaviors not as a problem but as communication. Your child’s behavior is actually communication. They're communicating to you that they are stressed. When we tune into their behavior with this in mind, our perspective changes and we learn to lean in with empathy.

programme.title: Peace of Mind Parenting - Peace of Mind Parenting - Day 3: What to Do When YOU Are Stressed
programme.desc: It's important that we as parents know how to deal with stress, which is the focus of today's lesson. When you manage your own stress, you're better able to connect with your children in these challenging moments, and you can co-regulate with them so they feel calm and safe too.

programme.title: Peace of Mind Parenting - Peace of Mind Parenting - Day 4: Judgement vs. Curiosity
programme.desc: Today’s lesson is all about getting curious about the context for why we make certain parenting decisions and better understanding where our judgments may be coming from so we can release them.

programme.title: Peace of Mind Parenting - Peace of Mind Parenting - Day 5: Change the Environment, Not the Seed
programme.desc: We’re not trying to change the seed; rather, we change the environment to provide an opportunity for our children to flourish, no matter who they are.

programme.title: Weight Loss Master Class - Weight Loss Master Class - This Is Why You 'Can’t Lose Weight'
programme.desc: The media tells you, 'Don’t worry! You’re big and you’re beautiful.' That you are healthy at any size. Nice to hear, but it simply isn’t true. Pharma companies and many in the medical community are now going to tell you it’s genetic — a disease of the brain that results in an insatiable hunger. They do this because surgeries and weight loss drugs are profitable. In this lesson, we will address these issues one by one.

programme.title: Weight Loss Master Class - Weight Loss Master Class - Calories: Everything You Need to Know
programme.desc: Let’s use a quick analogy: If your body is a car, then reverse is actively gaining weight, neutral is not gaining or losing, and drive is weight loss… Ultimately you have been eating more than you are burning, which is what put the weight on in the first place. By controlling the calories in, we generally shift the car from reverse to neutral. No longer gaining, but not really losing a ton. By adding exercise into the mix we throw the car into drive without compromising your metabolism or muscle mass.

programme.title: Weight Loss Master Class - Weight Loss Master Class - Body Fat: Why and How It Accumulates in Excess and What We Can Do About It
programme.desc: This lesson is the 101 on all things 'body fat' — what it actually is, what it does in and for the body, and what is considered a healthy body fat percentage. And, most importantly – for your purposes – how does it build up or, rather, get stored in the body and, conversely, how does it get released or “burned” off? Don’t worry, we aren’t going down a biochemistry rabbit hole here. These are just the must-know essentials.

programme.title: Weight Loss Master Class - Weight Loss Master Class - Balancing Hormones for an Optimized Metabolism
programme.desc: This lesson discusses the connection between hormones and metabolism. The goal here is to get your hormones in balance, which will regulate your appetite, optimize your BMR, and help you maintain lean body mass. The good news is that to do this we don’t need a deep dive on each and every hormone because what’s good for one hormone is typically good for all of them. Meaning, the recommendations in this lesson help bring your entire body into balance — so you don’t have to deal with each hormone on a case-by-case basis.

programme.title: Weight Loss Master Class - Weight Loss Master Class - The Relevance of Macros & Micros
programme.desc: At long last you have arrived at the diet section of this course. And while technically this episode is about food quality, this is where Jillian answers all your questions about popular fad diets. Keto, Carnivore, Paleo, Pegan, Vegan, Vegetarian, Low Fat, Intermittent Fasting, Low Glycemic. Which is best?! Find out what matters most for weight loss.

programme.title: Yoga For All - Day 6: Clarity
programme.desc: Your day 6 practice invites you to use core work to get clear. In this session we use controlled movement to activate the muscles of the abdominal for a strong and healthy back and strengthen your whole self.

programme.title: Yoga For All - Day 7: Prana
programme.desc: Your Day 7 practice is an invitation right to the good stuff. This fiery session is a warming sequence that guides to you create a healthy flow of energy in the body welcoming total mind and body health.

programme.title: Qigong: The Eight Brocades - Qigong: The Eight Brocades - Day 1
programme.desc: Qigong is considered one of the five branches of Chinese Medicine, a foundational basis for martial arts, and a long-standing spiritual practice revered in Daoist and Zen traditions. In this video, your qigong teacher, Mimi Kuo-Deemer, introduces you to the etymology of qigong and the history of the 8 Silk Brocades you will practice in this course.

programme.title: Qigong: The Eight Brocades - Qigong: The Eight Brocades - Day 2
programme.desc: Let any burdens you carry drop away while you move through this gentle, intentional qigong practice.

programme.title: Balance Your Hormones with Dr. Jolene Brighten - Balance Your Hormones - Day 1: Hormones 101
programme.desc: Your hormones work like a symphony. When every instrument is in tune, they play harmoniously. However, if one instrument is out of tune, or one hormone is out of balance, the entire piece is thrown off. Together, we'll decode your symptoms and work with your body to create hormonal balance. This means clear skin, easier periods, less hot flashes, better sex, and more restful sleep. Yes, it can be that good when your hormones are in check.

programme.desc: Your day 6 practice invites you to use core work to get clear. In this session we use controlled movement to activate the muscles of the abdominal for a strong and healthy back and strengthen your whole self.

programme.desc: Let any burdens you carry drop away while you move through this gentle, intentional qigong practice.

programme.desc: Your hormones work like a symphony. When every instrument is in tune, they play harmoniously. However, if one instrument is out of tune, or one hormone is out of balance, the entire piece is thrown off. Together, we'll decode your symptoms and work with your body to create hormonal balance. This means clear skin, easier periods, less hot flashes, better sex, and more restful sleep. Yes, it can be that good when your hormones are in check.

programme.title: Peace of Mind Parenting - Peace of Mind Parenting - Day 1: Positive Parenting in a Pandemic
programme.desc: Today, you'll learn solutions to this work, life, and parenting balancing problem many of us are experiencing during this pandemic. You're never going to be perfectly in balance, particularly during this time. But you’ll learn how to be aligned with your goals, values, and intentions.

programme.title: Peace of Mind Parenting - Peace of Mind Parenting - Day 2: What to Do When Your Child is Stressed
programme.desc: Today, we shift our thinking. We view these behaviors not as a problem but as communication. Your child’s behavior is actually communication. They're communicating to you that they are stressed. When we tune into their behavior with this in mind, our perspective changes and we learn to lean in with empathy.

programme.title: Peace of Mind Parenting - Peace of Mind Parenting - Day 3: What to Do When YOU Are Stressed
programme.desc: It's important that we as parents know how to deal with stress, which is the focus of today's lesson. When you manage your own stress, you're better able to connect with your children in these challenging moments, and you can co-regulate with them so they feel calm and safe too.

programme.title: Peace of Mind Parenting - Peace of Mind Parenting - Day 4: Judgement vs. Curiosity
programme.desc: Today’s lesson is all about getting curious about the context for why we make certain parenting decisions and better understanding where our judgments may be coming from so we can release them.

programme.title: Peace of Mind Parenting - Peace of Mind Parenting - Day 5: Change the Environment, Not the Seed
programme.desc: We’re not trying to change the seed; rather, we change the environment to provide an opportunity for our children to flourish, no matter who they are.

programme.title: Live Fearlessly with Anita Moorjani - Guided Meditation to Move Forward & Release Fear
programme.desc: Today’s meditation will guide you through forgiveness. Of letting go of obstacles and fears that hold you back from living the life you desire to live. By doing so, you’ll be able to forgive everyone who has hurt you in this life, release emotional baggage that may be weighing heavy on you, and step into a new realm of possibility.

programme.title: Hacking Your Healthcare - COMMUNE-Dr.Hyman, Hacking Healthcare-Day 3: Nutrition
programme.desc: How do you know if you're one of the 90% that's lacking in something essential? Let’s talk about the tests you can use to find out, and more importantly, what to do about it.

programme.title: Hacking Your Healthcare - COMMUNE-Dr Hyman, Hacking Healthcare-Day 4: Hormones
programme.desc: What could a hormone imbalance look like for you?

programme.title: Optimize Your Metabolism with Dr. Casey Means - Glucose Management with Diet and Lifestyle
programme.desc: By pairing the healthy metabolism eating principles with Dr. Casey’s nine blood sugar stabilizing strategies, you’ll be able to stabilize blood sugar day to day, which gives your mitochondria the best shot of being free to do their best work.

programme.title: The Emerging Science of Longevity - The Emerging Science of Longevity: Secrets to Healthy Aging
programme.desc: The body has inherent systems to slow and even reverse aging. When you activate these systems you increase stem cell production, reduce inflammation, increase antioxidant enzymes, build muscle, lose fat, and increase cognitive capacity.

programme.title: The Emerging Science of Longevity - The Emerging Science of Longevity: Eating for Longevity
programme.desc: Now that we understand the root causes of aging, how do we actually address the hallmarks of aging? What are the levers we have to optimize our health and longevity? Because medicine has it all wrong. We don't need to treat disease. When we focus on fostering optimal health, disease goes away as a side effect.

programme.title: The Emerging Science of Longevity - The Emerging Science of Longevity: Optimizing Health with the Fundamentals
programme.desc: There are basic fundamental ways we can optimize our health, starting with topics we’ve already discussed, like eating well and exercising appropriately. But, just as important for health and longevity is the need to rest, relax, and connect with each other. Community is essential, and being of service to one another can help you heal.

programme.title: The Emerging Science of Longevity - The Emerging Science of Longevity: Adversity Mimetics to Activate Healing and Repair
programme.desc: Too much stress will take you down, but the right amount of stress at the right time can activate your body's repair and healing mechanisms. What natural elements stress our system in such a way that it then activates the body to heal?

programme.title: The Emerging Science of Longevity - The Emerging Science of Longevity: Abundance Mimetics to Activate Longevity Pathways
programme.desc: If you get a brand new Toyota Camry, you can probably drive it for ten years without much attention. But if you have a 1938 Mercedes-Benz, it takes more love and care to keep it running. As we age, we become like that classic car, needing extra love and care.

programme.title: Gut Health with Dr. Mary Pardee - Day 2: The Gut-Brain Connection
programme.desc: For day 2, we'll look at the connection between the gut and the brain. We'll also practice mindful eating.

programme.title: Gut Health with Dr. Mary Pardee - Day 4: IBD and Helminthic Therapy
programme.desc: For day 4, we learn about common GI disorders and how to test for them.

programme.title: Gut Health with Dr. Mary Pardee - Day 5: GERD and Food Sensitivities
programme.desc: Healthy gut, healthy brain. For day 5, we learn how certain GI disorders affect brain functionality.

programme.title: Gut Health with Dr. Mary Pardee - Day 3: IBS and other Gastrointestinal Issues
programme.desc: Today, we dive into the most commonly diagnosed functional GI disorder, Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)

programme.title: Weight Loss Master Class - Weight Loss Master Class - The Role of Exercise in Weight Loss
programme.desc: Finally, the exercise episode! Exercise is the most powerful lever you can pull when it comes to longevity, health, and weight loss. It’s also the number one form of preventative medicine and helps prevent yo-yo dieting. Here Jillian provides clear guidelines for how much and what types of exercises you should be building into your weekly routine.

programme.title: Weight Loss Master Class - Weight Loss Master Class - Why Do We Have Insatiable Hunger?
programme.desc: Hopefully by now you understand that you gain weight because you have eaten more energy than you have burned in your day and stored that energy in your fat cells. But, have you ever wondered WHY you are overeating — i.e. eating more than you are burning? Why do we have such insatiable appetites when our bodies are usually pretty good at staying in balance? And no… it’s not because you have no willpower. This episode digs into where the physiological and psychological hunger is coming from — and how to cope with it.

programme.title: Weight Loss Master Class - Weight Loss Master Class - Weight Loss Cheat Codes
programme.desc: There are certainly things that can add a plus to our A, but these aren’t replacements for eating better and moving more. Nothing in this lesson will come close to impacting your results like diet and exercise. Nonetheless, Jillian offers her thoughts on cold exposure, heat exposure, and supplements.

programme.title: Weight Loss Master Class - Weight Loss Master Class - Way Beyond Willpower: Managing Relationships and Environments to Beat Temptation
programme.desc: Willpower is like a muscle: If you use it long enough without a break, it fatigues. It’s the moment at the Mexican restaurant when they go to drop the chips and you say, 'No thanks.' If the chips sit on that table, there is no chance you won’t end up eating the basket. So, let’s go over some basic techniques you need to program into your behavior and environment to safeguard yourself against momentary vulnerabilities. We also cover some serious boundary setting, so get ready.

programme.title: Weight Loss Master Class - Weight Loss Master Class - Your Complete Weight-Loss Plan
programme.desc: A big goal (if you have one) can feel a bit intimidating or overwhelming. This episode is here to help remove any of those anxious feelings with something called a goal pyramid. This simple technique will help you know exactly what to do and when to make that vision a reality!

programme.title: Yoga For All - Day 7: Prana
programme.desc: Your Day 7 practice is an invitation right to the good stuff. This fiery session is a warming sequence that guides to you create a healthy flow of energy in the body welcoming total mind and body health.

programme.title: Yoga For All - Day 9: Bold
programme.desc: Your day 9 practice asks you to check in with body and breath as a way of cultivating more awareness. The journey continues! The vocabulary grows. Move fearlessly through this practice by simply listening to your body. Check your habits and move with intention as a way of moving forward with confidence and focus.

programme.title: Vinyasa for Life - Vinyasa for Life: Forward Bending for Forward Thinking
programme.desc: Use what you learned in Day 4 to stretch the hamstrings and your backbody safely and effectively. Bring attention to your spine in Downward Facing Dog (Adho Mukha Svanasana) and Intense Side Stretch (Parsvottanasana), before working on Hand-to-Big-Toe Pose (Padangusthasana) with a strap. Finish in a supported backbend to counter your diligent forward folding.

programme.title: Vinyasa for Life - Vinyasa for Life: Foundations of Twisting
programme.desc: In this class, you'll investigate the mechanics of twists, one of Schuyler's personal challenges. Learn where you want to twist from—and where you don't. Apply the concept in active (think: core work!) and passive twists as well as standing, seated, and supine. You’ll finish class by massaging the base of the skull for a juicy release.

programme.desc: We’ve all experienced inflammation in some form. Today we address how to find this hidden symptom, identify it and its root causes, and stop it in its tracks. There is no optimal health with uncontrolled inflammation.

programme.title: Hacking Your Healthcare - Day 8: Metabolism and Mitochondria
programme.desc: What if I told you there was a reason you feel tired, achy, and foggy all the time? And what if I told you the solution was healing your body on the cellular level?

programme.title: Deep Relaxation with Tracee Stanley - Energy: Energetic Awareness Relaxation Practice
programme.desc: This Deep Relaxation session revolves around cultivating sensitivity towards the energetic body, with the aim of cleansing and rejuvenation.

programme.title: Good Mood Food with Jason Wrobel - Meditation for Brain Health
programme.desc: On our last day of the course together, Jason will show you specific mindfulness practices for enhancing your emotional health, discuss how meditation affects neuroplasticity, and teach you how to balance your neurotransmitters and the hemispheres of the brain.

programme.title: Hacking Your Healthcare - Day 7: Hidden Inflammation and Disease

programme.desc: What if I told you there was a reason you feel tired, achy, and foggy all the time? And what if I told you the solution was healing your body on the cellular level?

programme.title: The Nature of Reality with Deepak Chopra - The Nature of Reality: The Science of Reality
programme.desc: What is real? How do we know it's real, and how does that deeper understanding of reality help us fulfill our dreams, desires, and intentions? So let's go for it.

programme.title: The Nature of Reality with Deepak Chopra - The Nature of Reality: Fundamental Experience
programme.desc: Let's shift away from the scientific model to a different way of looking at that which we call reality.

programme.title: The Nature of Reality with Deepak Chopra - The Nature of Reality: Dreaming Reality
programme.desc: You dream every night, and whether or not you remember a dream, it's still an experience you have. Usually you will dismiss it in the morning, saying, “It was just a dream,” meaning it was not real. And the reason it's not real is that you look back and the dream is not here, it's over. So a dream by definition is transient, evanescent, ephemeral, ungraspable.

programme.title: Break Out of the Addiction Frequency - Section 1: The Addiction Frequency & The Power of Breath
programme.desc: Breathing is the single most important thing we do. Addiction is characterized by a sense of lack, of missing something. And when you breathe poorly, like when anxious or angry, you’re caught up in your head and aren’t breathing well and that sends a signal to your body that perpetuates the addiction frequency. Deep, long breathing is how we interrupt this pattern.

programme.title: Gut Health with Dr. Mary Pardee - Day 10: Test, Don't Guess
programme.desc: For day 10 we learn about the different kinds of tests that give us insight to one's gut symptoms. Knowledge is power!

programme.desc: The segment features three diverse luxury vessels: the long-range comfort of the Absolute Navetta 62 trawler yacht; the high-speed performance of the Mystic M4200 (PBIBS 2025) center console with raceboat heritage; and the elegant Sirena 48 Coupe (PBIBS 2025), an owner-operated yacht known for its efficient hull and open design.

programme.desc: This episode is dedicated to performance and versatility, highlighting the 50-knot Italian maxi-RIB Mar.co E44 with its luxury cabin. programme.desc: In this episode, we take an exclusive Mase Generators factory tour to see how marine power is built, followed by a trip to MIBS 2025 for a first look at the elegant Four Winns H6 and the high-performance Freeman 29

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 198
programme.desc: In this episode, we step on board the Princess V65, a sports cruiser that perfectly balances powerful performance with refined luxury, and discover the innovative BFF Uniko C34, a versatile Italian RIB featuring unique patented opening sides for an expanded living experience

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 199
programme.desc: In this episode, we explore the sheer elegance of the new Swan 128 flagship and take a high-speed look at the versatile Ranieri Sauvage 24

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 200
programme.desc: We dive into the raw power and timeless lines of the Baia Atlantica 84 before shifting gears to the stylish versatility of the Ranieri International 255 SL

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 201
programme.desc: Experience the refined sailing heritage of the Swan 51 followed by a journey into the spacious luxury and cutting-edge design of the Absolute Yachts 70 Fly

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 202
programme.desc: Step aboard the versatile Domina 42 WA for a look at its walkaround comfort, then head to the Giovanni Besenzoni scholarship awards to see the industry's brightest young designers being honored

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 203
programme.desc: Explore the iconic style of the Pardo 43 before heading to FLIBS 2025 for the sheer power of the Valhalla 55 SY and the classic craftsmanship of the Chris Craft Catalina 31

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 204
programme.desc: Admire the sleek lines and performance-driven design of the Solaris 55, then celebrate four decades of nautical history with the special edition Ranieri Azzurra 40th

programme.desc: Explore the iconic style of the Pardo 43 before heading to FLIBS 2025 for the sheer power of the Valhalla 55 SY and the classic craftsmanship of the Chris Craft Catalina 31

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 204
programme.desc: Admire the sleek lines and performance-driven design of the Solaris 55, then celebrate four decades of nautical history with the special edition Ranieri Azzurra 40th

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 197
programme.desc: In this episode, we take an exclusive Mase Generators factory tour to see how marine power is built, followed by a trip to MIBS 2025 for a first look at the elegant Four Winns H6 and the high-performance Freeman 29

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 198
programme.desc: In this episode, we step on board the Princess V65, a sports cruiser that perfectly balances powerful performance with refined luxury, and discover the innovative BFF Uniko C34, a versatile Italian RIB featuring unique patented opening sides for an expanded living experience

programme.title: Boom America
programme.desc: We’re back with Valor Clinic to take a deeper look at the inner workings of their foundation, which supports financially struggling veterans. Watch how these dedicated Americans are giving back to their fellow patriots in a big way. Fair warning—Mark’s work at Valor Clinic is a true tearjerker. Next, we take a quick trip to the tropics to catch Aggressor Adventures in action. Kyle Reyes checks in with owner Wayne for an update on how he’s been implementing the A-Team’s sage advice. After saying goodbye to Wayne, the team visits another incredible destination to reconnect with the founders of STAYCA VACAY. To wrap things up, Kyle Reyes stops by Compliant Technologies to experience their innovative product firsthand. And of course, we wouldn’t leave without a live demo of their shockingly advanced invention—The G.L.O.V.E.

programme.title: Boom America
programme.desc: It’s time to break down what the A-Team has learned from our latest group of companies—and how we can best support them in reaching their goals. Today, the spotlight is on A-Team member Larry Ward of Market Rithm. This seasoned CEO has seen it all when it comes to marketing strategy—and he’s got the accolades to prove it. Now, he’s setting his sights on helping businesses gain a competitive edge in their marketing efforts. Next, we’re introduced to another powerhouse on Kevin’s team: Nate Bailey, founder of Unleash the Leader Within. Nate brings a dynamic, personalized approach to scaling businesses that have often been overlooked. Rounding out this insightful roundtable discussion are A-Team members Chandler Kline from PICMII Crowdfunding and podcaster Dr. Jason Dean, each contributing their own unique areas of expertise.

programme.title: Beyond the Close
programme.desc: 10 of the country’s top realtors gather to begin a career-defining competition. Guided by a team of all-star business experts, these super-agents will be put to the ultimate test, to prove they have what it takes to rise to the very top and be number one. Follow them... Beyond The Close.

programme.title: The Big Reveal
programme.desc: The first episode of The Big Reveal kicks off with a bang or rather, a jolt, as Compliant Technologies premieres their newest gadget for pioneering the safety of police officers and civilians alike. Next, Kevin Harrington meets with two individuals that Unlock Math for children around the world. Later, Sheriff Mark Lamb sits down with Bonnie from Off Duty Police Officers for a look at her streamlining systems.

programme.title: The Big Reveal
programme.desc: The Big Reveal does it again by bringing three very different entrepreneurs together, all connected by their pioneer spirit. Flag Guard tips off this episode by explaining how they’re doing their part in keeping your loved ones safe. After that, Dr. West explains how his revolutionary probiotic will fix your digestive health 100% of the time. Host Kevin Harrington then caps off this episode in style with a trip to Tommasina Eyewear’s studio with a peak behind the curtain.

programme.title: Boom America
programme.desc: Today, Kevin and Toli sit down with a new batch of business owners looking to grow and thrive. This first business owner is the heart of America personified. Mark Baylis founded Valor for struggling veterans around America and now it’s time for the A-team to help him scale his mission to reach more patriots in need. From there, the team touch base with a rough and tumble businessman who brings bespoke adventure experiences to life. After that, the pioneers of STAYCA VACA bring their niche business model to the team for evaluation. Then, Compliant Tech caps off the day with a shock to the system.

programme.title: The Big Reveal
programme.desc: The first episode of The Big Reveal kicks off with a bang or rather, a jolt, as Compliant Technologies premieres their newest gadget for pioneering the safety of police officers and civilians alike. Next, Kevin Harrington meets with two individuals that Unlock Math for children around the world. Later, Sheriff Mark Lamb sits down with Bonnie from Off Duty Police Officers for a look at her streamlining systems.

programme.title: Real Man TV
programme.desc: In the last episode, Kyle took to the skies; now it’s the seas. Co-host Josh Peterson joins Kyle on a deep sea fishing excursion that ends in one of them losing their lunch.. but who will it be? Later (after everyone’s cleaned up) the gang reconvenes for a legendary course of fire with some serious artillery.. and Bob.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: Episode 2 is star-studded and action-packed! Get ready for amazing celebrity guests; and you know Don and Sheriff Lamb won't be giving the contestants a break. The challenges keep coming as SAR USA brings in a former FBI agent & trainer to put our contestants through an adrenaline-pumping exercise. Will all the contestants make it through the day? Watch now to find out!

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: Brace yourself for an edge-of-your-seat Tyrolean traverse (a horizontal ladder) over—and occasionally plunging into—the alligator occupied lake. Then, watch as our celebrity shooters and special guests unleash the power of some truly formidable machinery.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: Surviving Mann contestants are the best of the best. But even they had no idea what they were in for when put through their paces by Don Mann.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: In this episode, we find out exactly what Don meant by... all of that was a cover story.... What does Don really have in store for the 32?

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: Brace yourself for an edge-of-your-seat Tyrolean traverse (a horizontal ladder) over—and occasionally plunging into—the alligator occupied lake. Then, watch as our celebrity shooters and special guests unleash the power of some truly formidable machinery.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: If the previous day wasn’t physically challenging enough, Donn kicks off this episode with a mad dash for individual points. Next, the contestants and celebrity guests are tested with a unique course of fire. As an added treat, a Black-Hawk-Down pilot and war hero introduces the contestants to “The Glove”.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: Mann announces a reconnaissance and surveillance mission is imminent. The contestants are then tasked with electing a mission commander, while another top-notch competitor joins their ranks. Next, it’s not a day on Surviving Mann without a little physical training and a unique course of fire equipped with a folding AR.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: Don tests the competitors with the most grueling Log PT in the history of Surviving Mann and Surviving Mann All Stars. From there, a brand new Cobalt rifle makes the new course of fire a breeze.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: The legendary Black Rambo returns to help the crew with an all new weapons system. A new course of fire, combined with some survival training, challenges the contestants’ mission readiness. After that, the contestants are instructed on how to build a shelter from a survival expert among their ranks.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: The contestants are T-minus one day out from the critical mission and the heat is on. But before that, it wouldn’t be a Surviving Mann episode without some intensive PT. With a crash-course on how to build a sniper’s hide under their belts, the teams get their chance to get their hands dirty.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: After another grueling PT session, the contestants are pushed to their limits with a new course of fire courtesy of Stag Arms. From long range, 500 yards, to standing, kneeling and a 100 meter dash- will anyone complete this challenging course of fire? After that, the teams are put through extensive land nav training.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: The moment the contestants have been training for is finally here. But when a surveillance mission turns into a CQB, the contestants have to put all their training to the test. Find out who won Surviving Mann Season Two and who was the MVP of the season.

programme.title: Like a Train
programme.desc: In Like a Train, the award-winning documentary that began as a student film project, you will follow the Clearwater Knights, a high school football team determined to have a perfect, undefeated season and to have fun doing it. With a coaching prodigy, not even twenty-five years old, at the helm, leading the team alongside his best friend, the Knights are a unique blend of humor, tenacity and heart. Their story will excite you, move you and make you think about things you didn’t expect out of a sports documentary. Its original score, also composed and performed by the students, will have you tapping your feet as you root for the Knights. Like a Train isn’t just about football, it’s about life, love and people.

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: In this episode of Country Ball you'll meet Kayleb Wagner who broke the Florida state high-school rushing record held by Alabama alumni Derrick Henry, now a Tennessee Titan, and one of the NFL’s most dominant running backs. Showered with media attention, like most all-time record breakers, Kayleb was now a de facto superstar and destined to be bombarded with scholarship offers. But only one came and was then withdrawn. Why? Because despite his athletic and academic prowess, Kayleb has one arm. Hear Kayleb’s story in his own words, and the words of his amazing mom Sam, where he’s been, what he’s doing now, and most importantly, where he’s going.

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: The first part of the season finale starts now. Jesse’s back on his home turf of Clearwater, Florida, at Clearwater Academy International with not one, but TWO of his top players: Luca Stanzani and Dylan Djeté – who’ve both been playing football since they were little. Dylan’s a family-oriented player who got five touchdowns across his first two games in America. Luca’s been CAI’s starting quarterback since eighth grade and has both the brains and the dedication to go far. See just what these players can do in this episode of Country Ball!

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: Coach Jesse heads to Little Rock Arkansas, home of the famous Pulaski Academy and super-star high school football coach, Coach Kelly. The player? Joe Himon. With NFL speed and skills already, a heart of gold and courage to match, Joe has yet to commit and be recognized as the top rated recruit he should be. Find out what advice and help Coach Jesse has for Joe in this episode of Country Ball.

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: Meet Ryan Nolan, a hardworking, talented play-maker with integrity and intelligence to match. Unfortunately, at only 5’ 9”, his size has kept him off of many coaches' radar. Find out what strategies Coach Jesse has for Ryan to help him get scholarship offers and follow them on their shooting adventure as they compete to see who’s the fastest shot in this episode of Country Ball.

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: Richard Myers is a jack-of-all-trades on the offensive line with an incredibly strong work ethic. He’s already college football material. The problem? He lives in the middle of a small town in Indiana and needs help getting recruited. Come and see Coach Jesse and Richard bond over fishing and a good old-fashioned Indiana demolition derby as they discuss how to work towards Richard’s future and dreams for his football career.

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: With over 30 scholarship offers and a spot in his high school's Hall of Fame, Mario Eugenio is living proof that hard work and dedication pays off. But what happens when things don't go as planned? Find out in this episode of Country Ball.

programme.title: Like a Train
programme.desc: Overconfidence can doom a season and the Knights meet their biggest obstacle of the year. Were they ready or not? Why was Coach Jesse so upset on Halloween night?

programme.title: Real Man TV
programme.desc: Ziplining in Colorado’s Gorges, free falls and donuts. The Real Man show is back in full swing in Colorado. Kyle is joined by special guests and American Patriots as he explores what thrills and adventures this amazing country has to offer. And he’s just getting started.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: Episode 2 is star-studded and action-packed! Get ready for amazing celebrity guests; and you know Don and Sheriff Lamb won't be giving the contestants a break. The challenges keep coming as SAR USA brings in a former FBI agent & trainer to put our contestants through an adrenaline-pumping exercise. Will all the contestants make it through the day? Watch now to find out!

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: Brace yourself for an edge-of-your-seat Tyrolean traverse (a horizontal ladder) over—and occasionally plunging into—the alligator occupied lake. Then, watch as our celebrity shooters and special guests unleash the power of some truly formidable machinery.

programme.title: All Stars
programme.desc: It’s a new day, which means Don takes the contestants' training to new heights..literally. But first, the All-Stars are split into teams for a searching mission, using Offgrid’s Faraday bags. Later, they’re introduced to the new ropes course, “The Odyssey”, to test their mental and physical fortitude, as well as their endurance, using a climbing wall. See who rises to the occasion and who suffers from "paralysis by over analysis” in this episode.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: Surviving Mann contestants are the best of the best. But even they had no idea what they were in for when put through their paces by Don Mann.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: In this episode, we find out exactly what Don meant by... all of that was a cover story.... What does Don really have in store for the 32?

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: Kyle and Caleb give the skinny on the hamstring pull that was heard around the world. From there, Surviving Mann fans get a glimpse at just how far Faraday containers can go to protect your security, privacy and device. After, Black Aces does a deep dive into their available products and some exciting plans for the future.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: For physical training, Don does something unexpected when he hands over the reins to a contestant to lead. One would think that would make for an easy go of it, if it weren’t for the 3-time Olympian that was now in charge. Next, co-host Mike Glover leads Surviving Mann’s first ever After-Action report to debrief the previous night’s mission. Afterwards, the infamous Blah line makes its season debut to the contestants’ chagrin.

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: In this episode, competitor James gives us an update on how his injuries are progressing and how he’s able to push through when most thought he would be long gone. Luckily for the competitors, he had a special demonstration ready that involved hollow points and gel blocks. Later, Matthew recaps his experience with “The Glove”. To cap things off, Chris also sits down with BodyHz to talk about innovations in the non-chemical health industry.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: Episode 6 kicks off with some much anticipated weapons training and tactical shooting. Armed with some killer Black Aces shotguns, the teams are challenged with a unique course of fire. From there, Athlon Optics and Modern Pneumatic Sporting Devices configure a hunting air rifle for the contestants to play with.

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: Competitors Stephen and Danny sit down to recap the best and worst moments so far in the season. Also, Chris and Cindy sit down with Compliant Technologies’ founder to get the backstory on how the innovative product that is sweeping the nation (and terrorizing the contestants) came to be. Then Dr. West drops some truth bombs on the state of the average human body’s blood.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: The wrath of Mann is upon the contestants as Don doles out punishments to the entire squad for one person’s mistake. On the tails of the punishment, Don leads everyone in a lesson on BUD/S training. Later, co-host and retired Green Beret, Mike Glover, gives the contestants a life lesson on survival they won’t soon forget. To top off the episode, one of the contestants demonstrates his industry-changing hollow point bullets in some meaty targets.

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: Viewers get an inside scoop on the creation of Modern Pneumatic Air Rifles and their origin story. Spoiler Alert, it involves a big game hunt in South Africa. Next, Athlon Optics goes over how they’ve revolutionized Hog Hunting and thermal optics as a whole. Later, we get a look at the leader board and how close the race is going into the finale.

programme.title: The Big Reveal
programme.desc: Sheriff Mark Lamb (Surviving Mann) and UFC Hall of Famer Ken Shamrock (Surviving Mann) uncover a breakthrough changing how we live in a world full of invisible forces. Join them as Aires Tech reveals the science behind a revolutionary technology built to protect the human body from electromagnetic stress—empowering performance in a wired world.

programme.title: The Big Reveal
programme.desc: From the ocean to the lab, The Big Reveal dives deeper into the hidden impact of electromagnetic pollution. Discover how Aires Tech is helping people, animals, and even bees thrive—unlocking the secrets to balance, vitality, and true wellness in our connected age.

programme.title: All Stars
programme.desc: The day starts off with some unique courses of fire that get the All Stars’ blood pumping. With the help of Rogue Ops, New Frontier Armory and Griffin Armament, the teams are outfitted with the most premiere artillery in the industry. Then, the All Stars get out of the heat and head indoors to do some CQC training with Surviving Mann alum, Randy Couture. If anyone thought it would be a break.. they were surely mistaken.

programme.title: All Stars
programme.desc: It’s a new day, which means Don takes the contestants' training to new heights..literally. But first, the All-Stars are split into teams for a searching mission, using Offgrid’s Faraday bags. Later, they’re introduced to the new ropes course, “The Odyssey”, to test their mental and physical fortitude, as well as their endurance, using a climbing wall. See who rises to the occasion and who suffers from "paralysis by over analysis” in this episode.

programme.title: Wild Shots
programme.desc: This episode of Wildshots kicks off in South Carolina, where Tim Harmsen goes behind the scenes at Jacob Grey Firearms for an inside look at precision craftsmanship in action. Known for their stunning 2011 pistols—true works of art—Jacob Grey takes perfection to the micron. From raw metal to “The Hex,” Tim witnesses how engineering meets artistry to create one of America’s most elite handguns.

programme.title: Wild Shots
programme.desc: Tim heads to the Smoky Mountains for an action-packed adventure that’s as sharp as it gets. The journey kicks off at the world-famous Smoky Mountain Knife Works, the largest knife store on the planet, where Tim explores the artistry and precision behind the blades of We Knife. There, he reconnects with shooting legend Kyle Lamb, who shares his thoughts on the craftsmanship that keeps professionals equipped for anything. The action continues at Buds Gun Shop, where Tim joins Kyle once again to complete two of Lamb’s signature courses—the intense “Chaos Drill” and the dynamic “Triple Threat.” Together, they test speed, accuracy, and the mental discipline needed to master the range. But the day wouldn’t be complete without a little backwoods ingenuity. IraqVeteran8888 joins Tim for a bit of unconventional fun—combining creativity, curiosity, and some good old Redneck Science to wrap up an unforgettable episode.

programme.title: Like a Train
programme.desc: The Knights will face their biggest challenge yet. There be giants.

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: Meet Ryan Nolan, a hardworking, talented play-maker with integrity and intelligence to match. Unfortunately, at only 5’ 9”, his size has kept him off of many coaches' radar. Find out what strategies Coach Jesse has for Ryan to help him get scholarship offers and follow them on their shooting adventure as they compete to see who’s the fastest shot in this episode of Country Ball.

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: Richard Myers is a jack-of-all-trades on the offensive line with an incredibly strong work ethic. He’s already college football material. The problem? He lives in the middle of a small town in Indiana and needs help getting recruited. Come and see Coach Jesse and Richard bond over fishing and a good old-fashioned Indiana demolition derby as they discuss how to work towards Richard’s future and dreams for his football career.

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: With over 30 scholarship offers and a spot in his high school's Hall of Fame, Mario Eugenio is living proof that hard work and dedication pays off. But what happens when things don't go as planned? Find out in this episode of Country Ball.

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: In this episode of Country Ball you'll meet Kayleb Wagner who broke the Florida state high-school rushing record held by Alabama alumni Derrick Henry, now a Tennessee Titan, and one of the NFL’s most dominant running backs. Showered with media attention, like most all-time record breakers, Kayleb was now a de facto superstar and destined to be bombarded with scholarship offers. But only one came and was then withdrawn. Why? Because despite his athletic and academic prowess, Kayleb has one arm. Hear Kayleb’s story in his own words, and the words of his amazing mom Sam, where he’s been, what he’s doing now, and most importantly, where he’s going.

programme.title: Beyond the Close
programme.desc: Ladies and gentlemen, it's time to close the deal on Beyond the Close! Join us for the grand finale and winner celebration episode, where we'll reveal the triumphant super-agent who has risen to the very top of the competition. But that's not all. Get ready to hear firsthand from the contestants themselves as they reflect on their 90-day journey and share their growth, learnings, and future aspirations. It's a night of triumph, tears, and unforgettable moments as we bid farewell to the most thrilling season yet. And as if that wasn't enough, we have a very special guest in store. The one and only Christine Quinn, star of Netflix's Selling Sunset, will be joining us for the festivities. She'll be sharing her insights on the industry and giving us a glimpse into what it takes to be a top realtor. But wait, there's more! We'll be taking you on an exclusive tour of some of Miami's most luxurious properties, hosted by none other than some of America's top developers and agents. So sit back, relax, and get ready to be transported beyond the close.

programme.title: Wild Shots
programme.desc: In this episode of Wildshots, host Tim Harmsen heads to Sig Sauer for an exclusive look inside one of America’s most advanced firearms manufacturing facilities. With a motto of “Every day you wake up and get a little better,” Sig Sauer lives up to its words—producing over 5,000 firearms a day with cutting-edge robotics and precision automation. After a full factory tour, Tim hits Sig’s state-of-the-art testing range to get hands-on with the legendary XM250 machine gun, pushing the limits of modern firepower. Then it’s time for some pure shooting mastery as Tim meets up with friend and firearms influencer 22Plinkster. Known for his unbelievable accuracy and showmanship, 22Plinkster ups the ante—splitting playing cards with a .22 bullet, upside down, and even splitting a single bullet mid-flight to hit two separate targets at once. Finally, the episode caps off with a nod to Hollywood as Tim checks out the Genesis Arms machinery seen in John Wick, blending cinematic cool with real-world firepower.

programme.title: Wild Shots
programme.desc: Host Tim Harmsen teams up with SEAL Team 6 legend Don Mann to tackle real-world defense tactics and home-clearing techniques. A visit to Civil War battlefields connects history to modern freedoms, while the brutal 5-Year AR Challenge pushes an AR-15 through 10,000 rounds without cleaning. Will the rifle survive—or fail under fire?

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: Meet Ryan Nolan, a hardworking, talented play-maker with integrity and intelligence to match. Unfortunately, at only 5’ 9”, his size has kept him off of many coaches' radar. Find out what strategies Coach Jesse has for Ryan to help him get scholarship offers and follow them on their shooting adventure as they compete to see who’s the fastest shot in this episode of Country Ball.

programme.title: The Big Reveal
programme.desc: Step into the heart of innovation with The Big Reveal! Join Sheriff Mark Lamb and MMA legend Ken Shamrock as they explore groundbreaking American companies revolutionizing their industries. From elite camo designed through deer vision science to lightweight titanium firearm suppressors and EMF-neutralizing tech for peak performance—each story uncovers passion, ingenuity, and grit. Discover what’s shaping America’s entrepreneurial spirit. It’s not just business. It’s The Big Reveal.

programme.title: Wild Shots
programme.desc: Host Tim Harmsen teams up with SEAL Team 6 legend Don Mann to tackle real-world defense tactics and home-clearing techniques. A visit to Civil War battlefields connects history to modern freedoms, while the brutal 5-Year AR Challenge pushes an AR-15 through 10,000 rounds without cleaning. Will the rifle survive—or fail under fire?

programme.title: Farm Hero
programme.desc: Laura’s search for farm heroes leads her to White Cloud, Kansas to meet with Ray Archuleta who is inspiring an entire generation of agricultural trailblazers. In order to prove how vital soil health is to farming, Ray and Laura get their hands dirty in the fields to collect samples. With three samples in tow, its back to the lab they go to try out Ray’s rain simulator. How will the farm samples stack up? Let’s find out.

programme.title: All Stars
programme.desc: The day starts off with some unique courses of fire that get the All Stars’ blood pumping. With the help of Rogue Ops, New Frontier Armory and Griffin Armament, the teams are outfitted with the most premiere artillery in the industry. Then, the All Stars get out of the heat and head indoors to do some CQC training with Surviving Mann alum, Randy Couture. If anyone thought it would be a break.. they were surely mistaken.

programme.title: All Stars
programme.desc: It’s a new day, which means Don takes the contestants' training to new heights..literally. But first, the All-Stars are split into teams for a searching mission, using Offgrid’s Faraday bags. Later, they’re introduced to the new ropes course, “The Odyssey”, to test their mental and physical fortitude, as well as their endurance, using a climbing wall. See who rises to the occasion and who suffers from "paralysis by over analysis” in this episode.
